name: Meinhard Benne
businessDescription: Meinhard Benne propose un service complet de location de bennes dans le Var, les Bouches-du-Rhône et toute la région PACA. Des volumes de 3 à 10 m³ sont disponibles pour répondre à tous les besoins d’évacuation : gravats, DIB, terre, déchets verts ou encombrants. Chaque location comprend la livraison et l’enlèvement, garantissant un service simple, rapide et conforme aux normes. Destiné aux particuliers comme aux professionnels, ce service s’adapte aussi bien aux petits chantiers qu’aux travaux de grande ampleur. En complément, des prestations de démolition, de débarras et d’aide aux petits travaux viennent faciliter encore davantage la gestion des projets. Une équipe qualifiée, réactive et disponible 7j/7 accompagne les clients dans le choix de la benne la plus adaptée et veille à une installation efficace directement sur site. Avec son expertise et sa fiabilité, Meinhard Benne offre une solution clé en main pour simplifier l’évacuation des déchets et assurer la réussite de tous types de chantiers en Provence-Alpes-Côte d’Azur.
longBusinessDescription:
Meinhard Benne est une entreprise spécialisée dans la location de bennes à déchets, active dans le Var, les Bouches-du-Rhône et l’ensemble de la région Provence-Alpes-Côte d’Azur. Ce service s’adresse aussi bien aux particuliers qu’aux professionnels et permet de répondre à tous les besoins liés à l’évacuation de gravats, déchets industriels banals (DIB), encombrants, déchets verts ou encore de terre. Différents volumes de bennes sont proposés, allant de 3 à 10 m³, afin de s’adapter à la nature et à l’ampleur de chaque projet, qu’il s’agisse d’un simple débarras, d’une rénovation, d’un aménagement extérieur ou d’un chantier de construction de grande envergure. Les tarifs sont transparents et compétitifs, et chaque prestation comprend la livraison ainsi que l’enlèvement de la benne, garantissant une gestion des déchets simple, rapide et conforme aux réglementations en vigueur.
L’activité ne se limite pas uniquement à la mise à disposition de bennes : des services complémentaires viennent renforcer l’offre, tels que la démolition, le débarras et l’aide aux petits travaux. Ces prestations supplémentaires permettent d’apporter une solution globale et clé en main, adaptée aux besoins variés des clients. L’équipe, expérimentée et réactive, accompagne chaque demande avec sérieux et professionnalisme, en conseillant sur le choix de la benne la plus adaptée, en assurant son installation directement sur site et en organisant l’enlèvement dans les meilleurs délais.
La zone d’intervention est étendue et couvre un grand nombre de communes, incluant notamment Toulon, Marseille, Aubagne, Aix-en-Provence, Hyères, Fréjus, Draguignan, Bandol, La Seyne-sur-Mer, Saint-Raphaël, Salon-de-Provence et bien d’autres encore. Grâce à cette large couverture territoriale, il est possible de réserver une ou plusieurs bennes en fonction de la durée nécessaire, avec la certitude d’un service fiable et efficace.
En combinant expertise technique, qualité de service et forte réactivité, Meinhard Benne se distingue comme un partenaire incontournable pour simplifier la gestion des déchets. Chaque projet bénéficie d’une solution adaptée, qu’il soit modeste ou ambitieux, permettant d’avancer sereinement tout en respectant les normes en vigueur. Cette approche centrée sur l’efficacité et la satisfaction client fait de Meinhard Benne une référence en matière de location de bennes dans toute la région PACA.

name: Remodify.io
businessDescription: Remodify is a Cleveland-based startup reshaping how home repairs get done. Our platform connects homeowners with vetted trades professionals through transparent vetting (Remodscore), instant AI-powered estimates (Remodquotes), and smarter job matching (Remodmatch). Built for trust, clarity, and results—Remodify makes repairs simpler for homeowners and growth easier for professionals.
longBusinessDescription:
At Remodify, we’re rethinking the way home repairs connect homeowners and trades professionals. Built on trust and powered by clarity, our Cleveland-based platform is designed to eliminate the frustrations of the repair industry—missed callbacks for homeowners, empty leads for contractors, and broken trust on both sides.
Our three key solutions transform the process:
Remodscore offers homeowners a transparent, data-driven vetting system.
Remodquotes delivers fast, accurate, AI-powered cost estimates—clear, upfront, and reliable.
Remodmatch connects skilled professionals to the right jobs without junk leads or overpriced fees.
We’re not another gig economy app. Instead, we’re building a sustainable future where tradespeople are valued for their craft and homeowners gain peace of mind. Guided by our Rhythm of Re—reimagine, reinvent, redefine, rediscover, and reshape—we are rebuilding the repair industry from the ground up.
Our mission is simple: make home repairs easier, help professionals grow, and restore trust in the trades.

name: Lightyshare
businessDescription:
LightyShare is Europe’s first — and France’s largest — peer‑to‑peer marketplace for renting audiovisual equipment among professionals and creatives.

The platform links owners and renters, insures every transaction against damage and theft, and automates quotes, contracts, and payments. Over nine years it has attracted roughly 30,000 verified users, lists more than 22,000 ads totaling around €50 million in gear, maintains a 98 % five‑star rating, and saves renters 40‑60 % compared with traditional rental houses.
longBusinessDescription:
LightyShare unleashes creative potential by turning idle film gear into instant firepower. Conceived in a production truck in 2014, the platform now connects about 30 000 verified professionals and creatives across France. With more than 22 000 camera, lighting and audio listings—worth over €50 million—anything from an ALEXA Mini to a Nanlite panel is just a few taps away, fully insured against damage and theft, and available 24/7.
Renters slash budgets by 40–60 percent compared with traditional houses, while owners earn money and extend the life of their equipment—a win for wallets and the planet. A fast geolocated search engine, built‑in insurance and AI‑powered identity checks keep every deal smooth and trustworthy, as proven by a 98 percent five‑star rating.
After winning the SATIS “Most Innovative Service” award, LightyShare expanded nationwide in 2018 and delivered its 2.0 platform in 2021. Next up: moving into other French‑speaking markets and adding smart services that keep Europe’s creative engines humming.

myDid is a Web3-native platform that empowers community managers to build meaningful engagement through ethical AI and verifiable digital badges.
Facing disengaged audiences, scattered tools, and increasing burnout, organizations need a better way to reward contributions and foster belonging. With myDid, every action can be acknowledged, every effort visibly valued. 
Our solution combines

myDid is built on secure sovereign identity standards. Our infrastructure is sustainable and low-energy.

name: Frames
businessDescription: Frames is a digital notebook for film photographers. It helps analog shooters log camera settings on the go and later embed them as metadata into their scans. Designed with care for detail and simplicity, Frames brings modern tools to the timeless craft of analog photography.
longBusinessDescription:
Frames is a digital notebook made specifically for film photographers. It helps analog shooters keep track of the essential details behind every photo, such as camera settings, lens, film stock, location, and personal notes. Instead of juggling paper logs or repurposed note apps, photographers can now rely on a clean, intuitive interface designed just for their workflow.
Many film photographers develop a deep connection with their tools and process, but remembering the context of each shot weeks later can be difficult. Frames solves this by making it quick and natural to log information while shooting. Once the film is processed and scanned, these notes can be embedded into the final images as standard metadata, giving digital files the same rich context as their analog origins.
The app runs on iOS and macOS, with sync support through iCloud. Users can access their records across devices without worrying about vendor lock-in or hidden data collection. Frames is privacy-friendly, storing data locally by default and never collecting personal information.
Out of the box, the app includes a library of over 200 popular film stocks, and users can add their own. Cameras, lenses, and films can be saved as presets for quick access. Smart autofill features reduce repetitive entry, while map integration allows for tagging frames by shooting location. Notes can be grouped into folders, and final images can be exported with full metadata included.
Frames is the work of Vincent Tantardini, an independent designer and photographer who built the app to support his own creative workflow. It reflects a strong respect for analog photography while offering modern conveniences that stay true to the craft.
Whether you are documenting everyday life or building a detailed archive of your creative process, Frames helps you stay organized without interrupting the flow of shooting on film. It brings clarity and context to every frame, giving photographers a better way to bridge the gap between analog and digital.

name: DocShipper Qatar FR
businessDescription: DocShipper Qatar-France est implanté localement au Moyen-Orient et en Europe pour offrir un service logistique complet et personnalisé. Nous accompagnons les entreprises dans leurs opérations
longBusinessDescription:
DocShipper Qatar est un expert international en logistique et en freight forwarding, dédié à accompagner les entreprises dans leurs opérations d’import-export et de commerce international au Qatar. Grâce à une forte présence locale via nos agents, fournisseurs et courtiers en douane, nous maîtrisons parfaitement le marché qatari et ses spécificités réglementaires. Cette connaissance approfondie nous permet de proposer des solutions personnalisées, adaptées aux exigences du commerce dans la région du Golfe.
Nous offrons une gamme complète de services logistiques, incluant le sea freight, l’air freight, le road freight, ainsi que des options de transport multimodal et de door-to-door shipping. Nos experts veillent également à la bonne gestion des formalités de douane et à la qualité du contrôle de vos marchandises, pour garantir une livraison sécurisée et conforme. DocShipper Qatar met à profit plus de 11 ans d’expérience dans la gestion de la supply chain pour optimiser vos opérations logistiques, réduire les coûts et améliorer l’efficacité de votre chaîne d’approvisionnement.
Présent dans plus de 40 pays, DocShipper est reconnu comme un acteur majeur du global commerce avec plus de 6100 clients et 9200 opérations réussies à ce jour. Nos services couvrent également le sourcing, la vérification des fournisseurs et le supply chain consulting, ce qui fait de nous un partenaire complet pour les entreprises souhaitant étendre leurs activités à l’international. Notre réseau mondial, notamment en Asie, en Europe et au Moyen-Orient, facilite la gestion de vos projets, quelle que soit leur complexité.
Avec DocShipper Qatar, bénéficiez d’une solution logistique intégrée et sur mesure, alliant expertise locale et dimension internationale. Notre mission est de simplifier le commerce transfrontalier grâce à des services de qualité, de l’approvisionnement à la livraison finale, en passant par la gestion du transport, la conformité réglementaire et l’optimisation de la chaîne d’approvisionnement. Faites confiance à DocShipper Qatar pour vos besoins en transport, freight solutions et international shipping company, et bénéficiez d’un partenaire engagé à vos côtés pour assurer le succès de vos activités au Qatar et à l’étranger.
tags: Logistique, transport de marchandises, chaîne d'approvisionnement, import/export, commerce international

name: Smartshort

- Social Media Optimization: Videos are tailored to fit vertical formats and platform-specific best practices.

Benefits

- No video editing skills required: The intuitive interface and AI automation make it easy for anyone to create professional-looking videos.
- Create faceless content: Perfect for creators who want to stay anonymous, no need to appear on camera or record yourself.
- Boost engagement on social media: Add captions, emojis, and transitions that align with trending formats to maximize viewer retention.
Use Case

name: Maisons ElÃ©gance

Maison Élégance est un site web inspirant qui s’adresse à toutes celles et ceux qui souhaitent transformer leur intérieur avec goût, fonctionnalité et raffinement. Spécialisé dans la décoration, la rénovation et l’optimisation de l’espace, ce blog propose une mine de conseils pratiques pour améliorer chaque pièce de la maison. Les différentes rubriques couvrent des thématiques variées telles que l’aménagement, les travaux de rénovation, les astuces gain de place, ainsi que des tutoriels DIY accessibles, même aux débutants.
Chaque article est soigneusement rédigé pour offrir à la fois de l’inspiration et des solutions concrètes, avec un ton à la fois élégant et convivial. Le site se distingue par une approche esthétique assumée, mettant en avant l’harmonie des matières, l’équilibre des couleurs et le sens du détail. Que vous soyez à la recherche d’idées pour rénover votre salon, aménager une petite cuisine ou relooker une chambre, Maison Élégance vous accompagne à travers des contenus clairs, structurés et illustrés.
La navigation intuitive permet de trouver rapidement des idées pertinentes selon vos besoins. En somme, Maison Élégance est bien plus qu’un simple blog déco : c’est une ressource complète pour sublimer son intérieur avec style, efficacité et personnalité.

Users can easily browse themed collections — from nature and mandalas to inspirational quotes and abstract art — and download their chosen designs to print at home. Our audience includes wellness seekers, busy professionals in need of a mental break, art therapy practitioners, and creative hobbyists.
Currently free to use, Colorazen’s long-term vision includes offering a premium membership with exclusive designs, curated content, and access to a community where users can share their creations and inspire one another. We believe in the power of simple tools to create powerful moments of calm and joy.

name: EmoTrace
businessDescription:
Today, consumer preferences and behaviors evolve quickly, making traditional marketing research methods (such as feedback surveys and facial emotion recognition), obsolete and biased, as people don’t always verbalize or visibly express their true emotions.
 At EmoTrace, we leverage wearable sensors to track physiological reactions, including heart rate, skin conductance, and body temperature, in response to different stimuli. Our AI model then translates these signals into insights about consumers' emotional responses.

name: CryptoNovaX
businessDescription: CryptoNovaX is a next-generation digital asset management platform that empowers users to securely track, optimize, and grow their cryptocurrency portfolios across multiple blockchains. By combining advanced analytics, automated investment strategies, and robust security, CryptoNovaX makes decentralized finance accessible and efficient for everyone-from beginners to experienced investors.
longBusinessDescription:
CryptoNovaX is a pioneering digital asset management platform dedicated to transforming how individuals and institutions interact with the world of decentralized finance. Founded in 2024, CryptoNovaX provides a unified, secure, and intuitive environment for managing, optimizing, and growing cryptocurrency portfolios across multiple blockchains, including Ethereum, Solana, and BNB Chain.
At the core of CryptoNovaX is a user-centric philosophy that combines advanced analytics, real-time yield comparison, and automated investment strategies to help users make informed decisions and maximize returns. The platform’s powerful dashboard offers a comprehensive view of all holdings, performance metrics, and market opportunities, empowering both beginners and seasoned investors to take control of their digital assets with confidence.
Security and transparency are fundamental to CryptoNovaX’s approach. The platform is non-custodial, ensuring users always retain control of their private keys, and employs end-to-end encryption alongside regular smart contract audits. Community-driven governance, facilitated by the CNVX utility token, allows users to participate in key decisions, propose new features, and help shape the future of the ecosystem.
CryptoNovaX also places a strong emphasis on education, offering interactive modules and resources designed to demystify DeFi and foster financial literacy. With mobile apps available for both iOS and Android, users can manage their portfolios, monitor yields, and execute strategies anytime, anywhere.
By bridging the gap between cutting-edge technology and user-friendly design, CryptoNovaX is committed to democratizing access to decentralized finance and setting new standards for security, innovation, and transparency in the digital asset space.
tags: Digital asset management, DeFi, Portfolio optimization, Crypto security

Designed for children aged 3-7, Lunesia offers a safe, 100% ad-free environment for kids to explore a growing library of over 50 expertly crafted tales (with new stories added weekly!), including "Grizzetto Kitchen Adventure," "Poulpi Goes Bonkers," and "Ruby the Brave."
Our interactive stories allow children to make choices that shape the adventure, enhancing their creativity, critical thinking, and decision-making abilities. More than just entertainment, Lunesia's content is rich with educational value, designed to boost emotional intelligence, problem-solving skills, and gently instill timeless values like love, kindness, sharing, and respect. Our mission is to provide meaningful screen time that combines fun and learning, helps children conquer fears through positive narratives, and supports parents in establishing calm and joyful bedtime routines. longBusinessDescription:
Hitenant is a comprehensive digital solution designed to enhance the guest experience for vacation rental hosts, particularly property managers and concierge services. Our platform streamlines the guest interaction process by providing a fully customizable, digital welcome guide that offers essential information about the property, local attractions, services, and more, all in a single, easy-to-use interface.
Our solution also includes an additional sales feature, allowing conciergeries and property managers to seamlessly integrate a digital storefront within their guest welcome guide. This feature enables the sale of additional services, such as airport transfers, local tours, and exclusive experiences, offering hosts a new revenue stream while enhancing their guests' stay.

With millions of streams across major platforms, his immersive soundscapes and hypnotic beats have solidified his reputation, captivating audiences at live performances throughout Paris.
longBusinessDescription:
Play House, known by his stage name, is a dynamic and versatile EDM artist who has taken the electronic dance music scene by storm. With a strong passion for music and an unwavering commitment to his craft, DJ Play House has carved a unique path in the world of EDM.
Started his journey in the vibrant city of Paris, France, DJ Play House’s journey into the world of music began at a young age. Inspired by iconic figures like Avicii and David Guetta, he developed a deep appreciation for EDM and decided to make his mark in this electrifying genre.
In the world of EDM, DJ Play House made a striking entrance with his debut single, Electro Phoenix. This track served as a testament to his talent, and his music quickly gained recognition and a devoted following.
DJ Play House has showcased his music on various renowned platforms, including Spotify, where he has amassed a significant listener-ship. You can listen to his tracks on Spotify, and you can also follow his musical journey on YouTube and Amazon Music. Known for his versatile approach to house music and electronic music, he has created a distinctive sound that captivates audiences worldwide. His tracks encompass a variety of sub-genres, making him a go-to artist for EDM enthusiasts seeking an eclectic and electrifying experience.

longBusinessDescription:
2ndMarket.fr – The Independent Secondary Marketplace for SCPI Shares
2ndMarket.fr is the first digital platform dedicated to the resale of SCPI shares (French real estate investment funds) between private investors.
We offer a simple, secure, and legally compliant solution to sell or buy SCPI units at a freely negotiated price, outside the long and rigid redemption queues managed by asset managers.
Transactions are finalized through a notary, and all processes are handled online—from listing to signature.
Our mission is to bring transparency, liquidity, and control to a segment of the real estate market that until now lacked flexibility.
Founded in Normandy, 2ndMarket.fr is an independent fintech project recognized by Finance Innovation.

name: Almond Labs
businessDescription: Ecommerce innovation lab creating software products for lifestyle brands on Shopify.
longBusinessDescription:
Technology was meant to set brands free. To give control back to the creators, the innovators, the businesses built on originality. Instead, it’s done the opposite.
The very systems designed to support growth have become the chains that hold brands back. Marketplaces, platforms, and third-party solutions demand more—more data, more margins, more power—while giving less. The result? Founders become dependent. Margins shrink. The brands that built the industry become collateral damage, while the investors and platforms take the upside.
At Almond Labs, we believe in a different way. We are independent. Built by Studio Almond and focused on lifestyle brands who refuse to be boxed in.
We built Roadmap, our no-code Shopify toolkit, because we saw how brands were being held back. Instead of one-off fixes and expensive custom development, we develop solutions that work across businesses—so brands can access high-performance features without the overhead.
We consult because we know that technology alone isn’t enough. Success comes from strategy, from insights, from a partner who sees beyond the build to what really drives growth.
Now, we’re launching Cassi—a Buy Back & Consignment platform designed to help brands own their resale market. Instead of watching third-party marketplaces take control, brands can reclaim their secondhand economy, keep customers engaged, and build resale into their own ecosystem—on their terms.

name: Haier HR
businessDescription: Haier HR automates hiring with AI-powered resume screening, virtual interviews, and skill-based assessments. Streamline recruitment, reduce bias, and make smarter hiring decisions with ease.
longBusinessDescription:
Haier specializes in developing an innovative AI-driven hiring platform. Its flagship product is an
automated web application that analyzes candidate resumes and generates detailed reports on
their strengths, weaknesses, and skills in the form of radar charts.
High-scoring candidates are invited for an interview conducted by an AI-powered virtual
interviewer. Following the interview, another detailed report is generated to assess candidate
responses and provide further insights into their skills and suitability for the position.
This system aims to automate and streamline the hiring process, allowing companies to save
time and improve the quality of candidate selection.
Problem:
Haier addresses the major challenges of traditional recruitment:
● High Volume of Applications: Recruiters spend significant time sorting through
hundreds of CVs for each job posting, with an average ratio of 250 applications per hire.
● Time-Consuming Screening: Conducting numerous pre-screening interviews,
averaging 10 interviews per hire, is repetitive, inefficient, and prone to human error and
unconscious bias.
By automating these processes, our platform reduces the number of applications to review and
interviews to conduct, improving recruitment efficiency, quality, and cost-effectiveness.
Solution:
Haier utilizes AI to automate critical recruitment processes:
● Automated CV Analysis: Our algorithm rapidly analyzes resumes, identifying key skills
and qualifications, eliminating unconscious bias and human error.
● Detailed Reports and Skill Visualizations: Each candidate is assessed on their
strengths and weaknesses, providing recruiters with clear and actionable insights.
● Automated Virtual Interviews: AI-powered virtual interviewers conduct standardized
assessments, reducing the need for in-person interviews and improving efficiency.
Haier allows recruiters to focus on the qualitative assessment of top candidates, reducing
recruitment costs and improving the overall quality of hires.

name: MokN
businessDescription: MokN revolutionizes credential security with deception technology that traps attackers before they can exploit stolen logins. Our proactive approach helps businesses detect breaches early, automate incident response, and strengthen their cybersecurity posture.
longBusinessDescription:
MokN is redefining cybersecurity with a proactive, deception-driven approach to credential theft prevention. Traditional security solutions focus on detecting breaches after they occur - MokN stops them before they happen. By deploying realistic, high-fidelity decoys (such as fake VPN and webmail portals), our technology intercepts stolen credentials at their source, providing early warning of targeted attacks.
Unlike dark web monitoring, which only identifies compromised credentials once they have been publicly leaked, MokN retrieves them in real time directly from the attackers. This allows security teams to block unauthorized access, automate remediation workflows, and prevent breaches before they impact the organization.
Designed for seamless integration with existing security frameworks, MokN’s solution enhances SOC (Security Operations Center) efficiency by delivering actionable intelligence, reducing alert fatigue, and improving response time. With a focus on innovation, automation, and real-time threat detection, MokN empowers businesses to take control of their security and neutralize threats before they escalate.
tags: Deception Technology, Stolen Credentials Protection, Cyber Threat Detection, Anti-Phishing, Cybersecurity, SaaS

name: PC Bottleneck Calculator
businessDescription: The PC Bottleneck Calculator is a professional hardware performance testing tool that helps users quickly identify computer performance bottlenecks and provides optimal optimization solutions.
longBusinessDescription:
A PC Bottleneck Calculator is a tool designed to help users identify potential compatibility and performance issues within their PC systems. By analyzing key components such as the processor (CPU), graphics processing unit (GPU), random access memory (RAM), and screen resolution, it can assess the degree of performance matching between these hardware elements. The core function of the bottleneck calculator is to compare the performance capabilities of these components to determine the efficiency of their collaborative operation. For instance, if a CPU’s processing speed cannot keep up with the data processing demands of the GPU, or if the RAM capacity is insufficient for the current data processing tasks, the bottleneck calculator can pinpoint these bottlenecks and suggest possible solutions.
However, it is important to note that the results provided by the bottleneck calculator are not entirely precise, as factors such as software optimization, thermal throttling, and manufacturing variances can all affect actual performance. Additionally, with updates to software or drivers, the assessment of system performance can change over time, highlighting the necessity for continuous monitoring and adjustment. Despite these limitations, the bottleneck calculator remains a valuable reference, offering PC users a starting point to understand potential bottleneck issues and to conduct more in-depth research or manual testing before considering hardware upgrades or system configuration adjustments.

name: Sourcely
businessDescription: Sourcely is an AI-powered platform designed to optimize the academic research process. Catering to students, researchers, and professionals, it simplifies the discovery of credible sources, automates citation generation, and provides concise, AI-generated summaries. By streamlining these essential tasks, Sourcely helps users save time, enhance the quality of their work, and improve research productivity. With access to over 200 million scholarly papers and advanced search filters, Sourcely offers a comprehensive solution for anyone looking to conduct efficient, high-quality academic research.
longBusinessDescription:
Sourcely is an innovative AI-powered platform crafted to streamline the academic research process for students, researchers, and professionals. In today’s fast-paced academic world, conducting thorough research, generating accurate citations, and summarizing complex papers can be time-consuming and challenging. Sourcely leverages cutting-edge artificial intelligence to address these pain points, providing users with an efficient and comprehensive tool that enhances productivity and improves the quality of their academic work.
With access to over 200 million scholarly papers from a wide range of academic disciplines, Sourcely enables users to easily find credible and relevant sources for their research. Through its advanced search features, users can filter results by keywords, authors, publication dates, and more, ensuring they discover the most pertinent resources.
One of Sourcely’s standout features is its automated citation generation. Users can instantly generate citations in multiple formats—including APA, MLA, Chicago, and more—saving valuable time and ensuring proper attribution without the need for manual formatting. This feature is a game-changer for those who need to manage extensive bibliographies or work on time-sensitive projects.
Another key feature is Sourcely’s ability to summarize long academic papers into concise, digestible overviews. The AI-powered summarization tool scans through lengthy documents and extracts key insights, allowing users to quickly grasp the main points without sifting through pages of text. This capability is ideal for literature reviews, thesis writing, and research planning.
Additionally, Sourcely’s AI-driven feedback feature allows users to upload their drafts or research papers to receive tailored suggestions for improvement. This includes recommendations for citation placement, content clarity, and overall structure, helping users refine their work before submission.
Overall, Sourcely is designed to empower academics by automating time-consuming tasks and offering powerful tools to enhance the quality of research. Whether you are a student working on an essay, a researcher conducting a systematic review, or a professional preparing a thesis, Sourcely is the ultimate tool for accelerating research, boosting productivity, and ensuring academic excellence.
tags: AI research tool, academic research, citation generation

name: CryptoNovaX
businessDescription: CryptoNovaX is a next-generation digital asset management platform that empowers users to securely track, optimize, and grow their cryptocurrency portfolios across multiple blockchains. By combining advanced analytics, automated investment strategies, and robust security, CryptoNovaX makes decentralized finance accessible and efficient for everyone-from beginners to experienced investors.
longBusinessDescription:
CryptoNovaX is a pioneering digital asset management platform dedicated to transforming how individuals and institutions interact with the world of decentralized finance. Founded in 2024, CryptoNovaX provides a unified, secure, and intuitive environment for managing, optimizing, and growing cryptocurrency portfolios across multiple blockchains, including Ethereum, Solana, and BNB Chain.
At the core of CryptoNovaX is a user-centric philosophy that combines advanced analytics, real-time yield comparison, and automated investment strategies to help users make informed decisions and maximize returns. The platform’s powerful dashboard offers a comprehensive view of all holdings, performance metrics, and market opportunities, empowering both beginners and seasoned investors to take control of their digital assets with confidence.
Security and transparency are fundamental to CryptoNovaX’s approach. The platform is non-custodial, ensuring users always retain control of their private keys, and employs end-to-end encryption alongside regular smart contract audits. Community-driven governance, facilitated by the CNVX utility token, allows users to participate in key decisions, propose new features, and help shape the future of the ecosystem.
CryptoNovaX also places a strong emphasis on education, offering interactive modules and resources designed to demystify DeFi and foster financial literacy. With mobile apps available for both iOS and Android, users can manage their portfolios, monitor yields, and execute strategies anytime, anywhere.
By bridging the gap between cutting-edge technology and user-friendly design, CryptoNovaX is committed to democratizing access to decentralized finance and setting new standards for security, innovation, and transparency in the digital asset space.
tags: Digital asset management, DeFi, Portfolio optimization, Crypto security

name: EggOn Technology
businessDescription:
Revolutionizing Intelligent and Adaptive E-Learning for Law Firms. 
Our secure AI-driven platform empowers users and legal teams to eliminate frustrations, work faster, and enhance efficiency with their personalized virtual assistant. 
Experience seamless integration, real-time training support, proactive engagement, and multilingual capabilities with Chatbot nOg. 
Unlock productivity, reduce stress, and gain instant answers, access to training materials, and invaluable in-house support.
longBusinessDescription:
From Frustration to Innovation: Revolutionizing Intelligent and Adaptive E-Learning for Law Firms
At EggOn Technology, we understand that frustration often sparks the most transformative innovations. Our journey began with a simple observation: businesses, especially law firms, were struggling to maximize the potential of their technological investments. Remote collaborative work, alongside the technology and culture surrounding it, is here to stay. Analysts predict that managing remote workers and the accompanying technologies will be key business drivers through to 2024. However, technology alone won't solve these challenges – user adoption is critical.
Embracing the Challenge
The pandemic has forever changed the landscape of work. Prior to 2020, the concept of digital nomads and remote work seemed like a fringe trend. But as circumstances forced a global shift to remote working, businesses faced unprecedented challenges. Traditional methods of organizational change management, live training, and executive sponsorship proved inadequate for a dispersed workforce juggling personal and professional responsibilities at home. This frustration was the catalyst for our mission at EggOn Technology: to turn these challenges into opportunities for innovation.
Revolutionizing E-Learning for Law Firms
Our innovative solution for law firms is a secure, AI-driven e-learning platform that empowers users and legal teams to eliminate frustrations, work faster, and enhance efficiency. At the heart of this platform is our personalized virtual assistant, Chatbot nOg. Chatbot nOg provides seamless integration, real-time training support, proactive engagement, and multilingual capabilities, making it an invaluable tool for modern legal practices.
Our Philosophy
At EggOn Technology, we believe that to truly drive technology adoption, it’s essential to align new solutions with clear, measurable business outcomes. Our approach goes beyond just implementing technology. We focus on understanding the unique needs of each organization and its users. By setting realistic business goals and creating tailored adoption programs, we ensure that our solutions deliver tangible improvements in performance, cost reduction, risk management, and time savings.
Continuous Improvement and Engagement
We recognize that technology and user needs are constantly evolving. That's why we maintain an ongoing dialogue with our clients, regularly updating and refining our solutions to meet changing demands. By integrating feedback loops into our software, we enable users to directly communicate their needs and suggest new features, ensuring our technology remains relevant and effective.
Unlocking Productivity and Reducing Stress
With Chatbot nOg, legal teams gain instant answers, access to training materials, and invaluable in-house support, which unlocks productivity and reduces stress. This personalized virtual assistant adapts to the needs of each user, providing a tailored learning experience that makes complex tasks simpler and more manageable. By offering real-time support and proactive engagement, Chatbot nOg helps users stay ahead in a fast-paced legal environment.
Leadership and User Buy-In
Successful adoption of new technology requires strong leadership and user engagement. Our management team plays a crucial role in this process, demonstrating the benefits of our solutions and fostering a culture of innovation. By highlighting the tangible benefits of change, we help organizations move beyond resistance and embrace new ways of working.
Looking Ahead
As we look to the future, EggOn Technology remains committed to transforming frustration into innovation. We are dedicated to helping businesses navigate the complexities of remote work, leveraging technology to create more efficient, secure, and productive environments. Our goal is to empower our clients to achieve their business objectives and thrive in an ever-changing world.
For more information on how EggOn Technology can help your business turn frustration into innovation and revolutionize e-learning for law firms, contact us today. Together, let's shape the future of work : https://www.eggon-technology.com/

name: Africatik
businessDescription: AFRICATIK se présente comme un référentiel d'applications éducatives adaptées au contexte africain.Révisions, exercices, recherche..., Africatik vise à réunir la plus grande base d'applications éducatives d'Afrique, dans de nombreuses disciplines et également en langues nationales.Les applications d’Africatik ont l'avantage de se décliner non seulement en français (et en anglais) mais également en langues nationales de différents pays d’Afrique : kikongo, lingala, swahili, tshiluba, sont disponibles pour la RD Congo.
longBusinessDescription: AFRICATIK se présente comme un référentiel d'applications éducatives adaptées au contexte africain.Révisions, exercices, recherche..., Africatik vise à réunir la plus grande base d'applications éducatives d'Afrique, dans de nombreuses disciplines et également en langues nationales.Les applications d’Africatik ont l'avantage de se décliner non seulement en français (et en anglais) mais également en langues nationales de différents pays d’Afrique : kikongo, lingala, swahili, tshiluba, sont disponibles pour la RD Congo. Il existe aussi le diola, pulaar, sereer, wolof pour le Sénégal, le somali pour Djibouti et le malagasy pour Madagascar. De nouvelles langues (Mali, Côte d’Ivoire) seront disponibles dans le premier semestre de 2021. Pour cela Kanieba Interactive s’appuie sur un réseau d’enseignants-traducteurs nationaux à même de traduire les applications et de proposer de nouvelles idées.Les applications se présentent comme des « exerciseurs » ludiques qui peuvent être utilisées soit au sein d’une classe, soit en autonomie par l’élève lui-même en-dehors de l’école.En effet, ces applications sont accessibles au travers de plusieurs canaux (web, mobile, exécutables Windows). La diffusion sur AppStore, Windows Store et Facebook Instant Games est attendue dans le premier semestre 2021.L’enfant est ainsi autonome et peut s’exercer tout en s’amusant quand il veut et où il veut.

name: Kiido
businessDescription: Coparenting can be difficult - we make it easier. Kiido is an ally for separated and divorced parents (and their employees). We work with employee-friendly large / medium companies. These companies have corporate social responsibility (CSR) programs aimed at finding better work-life harmony for their employees. We position Kiido as a holistic co-parenting solution (SaaS) - mobile app, webinars, counseling appointments, newsletters for their employees who are separated / divorced with kids or are part of recomposed families.
longBusinessDescription:
Kiido, a digital platform dedicated to separated parents, offers an innovative solution to companies that want to address the well-being of their employee-parents. 
93% (ninety-three) of men and 74% (seventy-four) of women recognize that divorce and separation affect their working lives in various ways: loss of productivity, isolation and high mental workload. 
Kiido is a tool that can help not only separated or divorced parents to manage co-parenting, but also employers to reduce the negative aspects at work. 
Kiido isn't just a co-parenting app - it's a complete solution designed to revolutionize the way separated parents navigate their daily lives: a smart mobile app to communicate, plan, manage finances and make decisions effortlessly, while putting children's well-being first. Kiido also offers a network of trusted professionals for advice, personalized newsletters, informative events on practical co-parenting, and much more. 
Employers can offer Kiido as a valuable resource to their employees, reinforcing the policy of well-being in the workplace. Data protection is of paramount importance to us. For companies, our solution promotes a better work-life balance, reducing stress and absenteeism while boosting employee and parent engagement and productivity.

longBusinessDescription: Pictia is an ultimate image bank that provides comprehensive services for artists and creators. Their real-time monitoring system, powered by AI, scans the entire web—including websites and social networks—to detect any fraudulent use of your images, even if they have been altered. You receive an exact list of domains and URLs where your images are found, ensuring continuous protection for your art online1. When Pictia detects unauthorized use of your image, you can entrust them with dispute management. They create legally admissible standardized internet reports (Afnor Z67-147) that strengthen your case against offenders2. Additionally, Pictia allows you to monetize your creations through licensing and NFTs, providing a platform for artists to protect their work and grow their revenue.

longBusinessDescription:
The Essence App empowers women and people with cycles to thrive in the workplace by optimizing well-being and performance according to the menstrual cycle. The platform’s mission is to close the well-being gender gap in the workplace, lowering burnout and churn rates for menstruating people. Essence continues to research the relationship between productivity and the menstrual cycle.
The Essence App is a tool for anyone, regardless of gender, who wants to expand their knowledge of how menstrual cycles impact a person's mental and physical health. Educating companies on this topic is an important step toward improving the workplace climate and promoting menstrual well-being.

tags: French language learning, Vocabulary expansion, Educational games

name: GetMySquad
businessDescription:
GetMySquad is redefining the landscape of seasonal staffing with a pioneering platform that goes beyond conventional recruitment methods. By integrating advanced AI technology, we enable businesses to access multimedia-rich profiles that vividly showcase the capabilities and personalities of candidates. This approach facilitates direct and impactful connections through real-time video chats and sophisticated scheduling tools, democratizing features that were once exclusive to large enterprises.

Our commitment is to make the recruitment process not only accessible but also equitable, nurturing a community where every interaction has the potential to spark opportunities. GetMySquad is transforming how businesses and job seekers engage, creating a synergistic environment that promotes growth and success for all involved.
longBusinessDescription:
GetMySquad addresses the critical challenges facing the seasonal staffing market, which is often hindered by inefficient hiring processes and a lack of accessibility for small to medium-sized enterprises (SMEs). Traditional recruitment methods are not only time-consuming but also fail to effectively match the right talent with the right opportunities, especially in industries such as hospitality, agriculture, retail, and construction that experience high turnover and demand rapid staffing solutions.
The market for seasonal staffing is vast and under-served, with many businesses struggling to find qualified staff during peak periods. These businesses typically face significant obstacles, including geographical limitations and the high costs associated with traditional recruitment agencies. Additionally, the reliance on outdated CVs and paper-based applications does not meet the dynamic needs of modern businesses or job seekers who are increasingly looking for quicker, more interactive hiring processes.
GetMySquad introduces a transformative solution with its AI-driven platform that leverages video and photo content to create vibrant, engaging job seeker profiles. This approach not only enhances the visibility of candidates' skills and personalities but also enables employers to make more informed hiring decisions quickly. Our platform includes features such as real-time video interviews and automated scheduling, making it easier for employers to connect with potential employees without the geographical or logistical barriers that traditionally hampered quick staffing.
Furthermore, GetMySquad is designed with inclusivity in mind, ensuring that SMEs have the same access to top-tier recruitment tools as larger corporations. This levels the playing field, allowing smaller businesses to compete effectively and efficiently manage their staffing needs. By reducing the time and cost associated with hiring, GetMySquad empowers businesses to focus on growth and operational success, while also providing job seekers with fair and transparent access to opportunities.
In summary, GetMySquad is not just enhancing the recruitment process; it is actively solving prevalent market problems by making the hiring process faster, more accurate, and accessible for all businesses, thereby fostering a healthier, more competitive job market.

name: Hylight
businessDescription: We are building a solution to monitor infrastructure in a cost effective and sustainable way.
longBusinessDescription:
There are 80 million kilometers of energy infrastructure on our planet.
That is 200 times the distance between the Earth and the Moon.
‍
These power lines and pipelines are critical to the proper functioning of our society. And they have to be inspected at regular intervals (sometimes several times a month) to ensure their good condition and prevent failures.
Today, these inspections are carried out with vehicles that emit high levels of greenhouse gases. The HyLighter is able to carry out these inspections more accurately, more safely for human beings and with 0 greenhouse gas emissions in flight.
Beyond this direct avoidance of emissions, our greatest impact lies in the data we collect.
Because, by making inspections more efficient, the HyLighter enables the detection of previously uncollected data. Indeed, large scale methane leak detection is now viable! These leaks on oil and gas infrastructures account for 4% of global greenhouse gas emissions. Yet, operators can repair them. But to repair them, they must be identified.
HyLight makes this possible at large scale and even for the finest leaks.
HyLight's technology will soon be useful in other sectors too.
We'll be able to observe hundreds of hectares of European forests and understand the new diseases affecting them. We'll be able to analyze the evolution of sea levels by effectively observing coastlines. We'll be able to understand the growing hydric stress affecting our agricultural land, so that we can direct our efforts to the right places.
The HyLighter will enable us to better observe and understand our world in the face of climate change.
tags: drones, hydrogen vehicles, hydrogen, deep tech

The market for seasonal staffing is vast and under-served, with many businesses struggling to find qualified staff during peak periods. These businesses typically face significant obstacles, including geographical limitations and the high costs associated with traditional recruitment agencies. Additionally, the reliance on outdated CVs and paper-based applications does not meet the dynamic needs of modern businesses or job seekers who are increasingly looking for quicker, more interactive hiring processes.
GetMySquad introduces a transformative solution with its AI-driven platform that leverages video and photo content to create vibrant, engaging job seeker profiles. This approach not only enhances the visibility of candidates' skills and personalities but also enables employers to make more informed hiring decisions quickly. Our platform includes features such as real-time video interviews and automated scheduling, making it easier for employers to connect with potential employees without the geographical or logistical barriers that traditionally hampered quick staffing.
Furthermore, GetMySquad is designed with inclusivity in mind, ensuring that SMEs have the same access to top-tier recruitment tools as larger corporations. This levels the playing field, allowing smaller businesses to compete effectively and efficiently manage their staffing needs. By reducing the time and cost associated with hiring, GetMySquad empowers businesses to focus on growth and operational success, while also providing job seekers with fair and transparent access to opportunities.
In summary, GetMySquad is not just enhancing the recruitment process; it is actively solving prevalent market problems by making the hiring process faster, more accurate, and accessible for all businesses, thereby fostering a healthier, more competitive job market.

name: LePhish
businessDescription:
Tests de phishing automatisés - Formation fondée sur la science de l'apprentissage et la psychologie du changement

Dans un monde numérique où l’email est une cible privilégiée, la grande majorité des cyberattaques démarrent par un simple clic. Le Phish, à l’intersection de la technologie et de la formation, offre une solution innovante qui révolutionne la prévention et la gestion du risque humain en cybersécurité.

Pourquoi Le Phish se distingue :

- Scénarios immersifs : Inspirés des techniques d'ingénierie sociale employées par les cybercriminels, nous reproduisons fidèlement les stratégies d'attaques en temps réel. À chaque étape, nous testons, adaptons et personnalisons l’expérience pour chaque employé.

- Formation à la pointe : En s'appuyant sur une approche de micro-learning, chaque interaction devient une session d'apprentissage. Nous combinons les meilleures méthodes pédagogiques pour transformer les erreurs en opportunités d'évolution.

- Automatisation intelligente : Tout comme nos concurrents de haut niveau, nous comprenons l'importance de l'évolution constante. C'est pourquoi Le Phish automatise et varie les scénarios, offrant une protection dynamique et continue.

- Insights clairs et pertinents : Avec un tableau de bord intuitif, vous obtenez une vision claire des tendances, des risques et des zones d'amélioration. C'est la cybersécurité en temps réel, à portée de main.

Notre engagement : Au-delà de la conformité, nous sommes dédiés à créer une culture de cybersécurité. Dans un monde où l'ingénierie sociale est au cœur des attaques, Le Phish ambitionne de rendre chaque employé un rempart efficace et éclairé.

name: Mea huna
businessDescription:
MEA HUNA is the first natural alternative to chemical and carcinogenic deodorants.

It is an anti-marks and anti-odor patch. A healthy product for the body and for the planet.

I donate €1 from each sale to an breast cancer organization.
longBusinessDescription:
When the person I love most in the world was diagnosed with breast cancer, my research on the subject began. After becoming aware of the harmfulness of the products that we apply daily to an area as sensitive and fragile as our armpits, I became interested in the subject.
I spoke with doctors and pharmacists, then for 2 years, I imagined a product.
A practical, comfortable and ecological one.
After a lot of tests, I create MEA HUNA product.
The first healthy, invisible and comfortable patches for dry armpits all day long.
Despite the obstacles, I did not give up, because I am deeply convinced that this product can help thousands of women and men”
Creating Mea Huna has been a long road full of challenges.
I knew absolutely nothing about textile making. I knew nothing about the different fabrics, their weight and their maintenance. I wasted a lot of time and money due to lack of experience. Today I am even more happy to introduice the first patch that will make you feel better in your body and in society.

name: PlayMyType
businessDescription:
Find Out Your Personality Type By Playing A Little Game. 

Personality assessments are tools that help you to understand yourself and others better. They measure various aspects of your personality, such as your traits, preferences, motivations, and behaviors.

Playmytype™ is a gamified version of the Big Five model and solves two major weaknesses in the Big Five model: Flawed measurement and Biased understanding. 

You can learn more about that in our website >> https://playmytype.com
longBusinessDescription:
Do you want to hire the best talent and build high-performing teams for your company? If so, you need a reliable and valid tool to assess the personality type and preferences of your job candidates and team members.
Playmytype™ is a powerful tool that provides you with unparalleled insights into your employees’ personalities, allowing you to optimize your recruitment and management strategies for maximum impact.
Many companies told us that our personality type assessment is a game-changer. After all, it is literally a game. They mentioned four things that made it so helpful:
1. Accurate results
PlayMyType™ is founded on the extensively researched Big Five model of Personality Traits, renowned for its robust reliability and validity established through decades of scientific research. 
You can trust that our game will measure your candidates’ and employees’ personality traits and preferences accurately and consistently, giving you a reliable basis for your decisions.
You can read more about the science here.
2. Interview enhancers
Our game offers an interactive, accessible adventure across all devices, where a player’s choice shapes the unfolding story, providing insights into their personality.
The game provides you with experiences that you can use as a reference to talk about during an interview and explore further how the candidate fits to your organization.
You can also use the game to assess your current employees’ personality and potential as part of a team-building event or simply to help them grow and develop.
3. Promote the company
By using our game as part of your recruitment and management process, you show your company as innovative, exciting, and fun. 
You’ll more easily attract great talent without further effort and cultivate a thriving work environment which promotes diversity and inclusivity. That’s an easy way to boost your company’s reputation and brand. 
4. Saves time
Successful companies told us that with us they save plenty of time. 
They had to invest less time on reading the results, as they are concise, actionable, and easy to understand. They also had to invest less time on connecting the results to the larger picture, to the company’s vision and values, and to the desired outcome. 
Go ahead and check how our gamified version of the Big Five model can help your organization >> https://playmytype.com

Research at the MIT, the University of Cambridge, the Inria and the CNRS.

name: Logic Invest

longBusinessDescription:
LogicInvest réinvente l'expérience utilisateur dans l'univers de la fintech, en fusionnant une technologie de pointe et une expertise financière approfondie.
Au cœur de notre approche novatrice, des simulateurs fiscaux et des outils interactifs pour simplifier et enrichir la prise de décision financière. Qu'il s'agisse d'investissements, de planification fiscale ou de gestion budgétaire, LogicInvest guide chaque utilisateur vers les choix les plus éclairés.
Nos simulateurs vous permettent par exemple de calculer facilement votre imposition sur les plus-values immobilières ou mobilières selon votre situation fiscale. Vous pouvez aussi estimer vos droits à la retraite selon différents scénarios d'épargne et de placements. Et ce n'est qu'un aperçu des nombreux outils innovants développés par nos experts pour vous faciliter la vie!
En plus de ces fonctionnalités de pointe, LogicInvest mise aussi sur la pédagogie. En tant que média new-age, nous démystifiont les sujets financiers complexes à travers des vidéos percutantes et des articles pedagogique. De la bourse, placement, préparation de la retraitee en passant par l'immobilier, notre contenu balaie toute la gamme des placements, du basique à l'avancé.
Et ce n'est pas tout: LogicInvest met aussi en relation ses utilisateurs avec des partenaires financiers triés sur le volet. Courtiers en valeurs mobilières, plateformes de prêts, gestionnaires de patrimoine… Quels que soient vos objectifs d'épargne et de placement, leur équipe de conseillers personnalise des recommandations adaptées à votre situation.
Que vous soyez novice ou expert, LogicInvest vous accompagne à chaque étape clé de vos finances personnelles. Gestion de budget, optimisation fiscale, placements rentables, préparation de la retraite, transmission de patrimoine.

longBusinessDescription:

Our story begins with a simple question: how do we make computers even faster, more powerful, and more efficient? By integrating memory and compute into the chips, our product accelerates the performance of big data applications by up to 20 times, while being 10 times more energy efficient.
Created in 2015 in Grenoble, a microelectronics hub, UPMEM is now made up of an international team of 23 people, passionate and driven by the same audacity, that of revolutionizing the IT industry. From the data center and artificial intelligence to edge computing  and genomics, we want to offer solutions that enable companies and the scientific community to make major breakthroughs in their industries.
With leading industrial and financial support in Europe, America and Asia, UPMEM was recently selected among the top 100 innovative Silicon 100 startups by EETimes, received support from the EU H2020 EIC Deep Tech Challenge in 2022, and completed its second round of fundraising in early 2023.

longBusinessDescription:

With a strong commitment to user privacy and data security, KeepForEver provides a safe and secure environment for preserving and sharing important information with designated beneficiaries.
The platform offers a range of features, including robust encryption measures, secure data storage, and the ability to specify inheritance preferences. Users can ensure that their digital assets, such as photos, documents, and online accounts, are handled according to their wishes after they're gone.
What sets KeepForEver apart is its dedication to safeguarding user data and providing a user-friendly interface for managing digital legacies. The platform's encryption technology, including AES-CBC 256-bit encryption, ensures the confidentiality and integrity of stored data.
Whether it's preserving cherished memories or ensuring the seamless transfer of vital information, KeepForEver empowers users to take control of their digital legacy. With a focus on privacy and security, it has become a notable solution in the digital inheritance landscape."

name: Yuzu
businessDescription: Write beautiful & effective updates, hit send. Show your investors you care and get funded more easily.
longBusinessDescription:
Yuzu provides a platform for entrepreneurs and startups to write and send investor updates. As a Saas Founder, you understand the importance of keeping investors up-to-date on the progress of your business, and this platform is designed to make that process as easy and efficient as possible.
With Yuzu, users can create professional-looking investor updates in a matter of minutes. The platform includes a variety of templates and customizable sections, such as financials, product updates, team changes, and milestones. Users can easily input data and metrics, add graphs and charts, and format text to their liking.
Once the update is complete, users can easily send it out to their investor network through the platform. They can choose which investors receive the update, and the platform automatically tracks who has opened and read the email. This helps entrepreneurs keep track of their investor engagement and follow up with those who may need more information.
Yuzu also includes analytics and reporting features, which allow users to see how their updates are performing over time. They can track open rates, click-through rates, and engagement levels, and use this data to improve their communication strategy with investors.
Overall, Yuzu is a valuable tool for entrepreneurs and startups who want to keep their investors informed and engaged. By streamlining the update process and providing actionable data, you are helping founders build better relationships with their investors and ultimately, grow their businesses more effectively.

Simple setup process: With Evolup, creating an affiliate store is a straightforward process that takes only a few clicks. There's no need to worry about buying inventory, preparing orders, or dealing with customer service.

Commission-based earnings: When customers finalize a purchase through an Evolup-powered affiliate store, the user earns a commission on the sale. This makes Evolup a great way to generate income online.
Advanced tools: Evolup offers advanced tools and features such as artificial intelligence, Amazon synchronization, and advanced SEO capabilities to help users maximize their earnings.
In summary, Evolup is a platform that makes it easy for anyone to start an affiliate store and earn commissions by promoting products they love.

businessDescription:
Digeto enables operational execution for impact-driven businesses that go global.

Our integrated platform provides best-in-class services for:
• Market entry strategy
• HR
• Legal and Compliance
• Accounting and Tax
• Fundraising and Cash Management
• Logistics and Supply Chain
• ESG - embedded by design into our approach.

Your benefits: Seamless, Fast, and Cost-Effective Operational Execution.

Partner with Digeto now, where global reach meets local impact.
longBusinessDescription:
Digeto stands as a pioneering force, dedicated to sculpting a brighter future by empowering businesses with a deep-rooted commitment to social, environmental, and economic impact, aiming for a bold leap into global markets. At its core, Digeto is a haven for companies driven by a vision to enact substantial, positive transformations, serving as a catalyst for change in society, the environment, and the global economy. With its sights set firmly on International Trade and Development, Digeto weaves a rich tapestry of support for impact-driven organizations, enabling them to cross borders and tackle operational challenges with unparalleled agility and precision.
Central to Digeto’s ethos is an integrated platform, ingeniously crafted to support businesses as they navigate the intricacies of global expansion. This platform stands as a beacon of excellence, offering an array of top-tier services in crucial areas such as Market Entry Strategy, Human Resources, Legal and Compliance, Accounting and Tax, Fundraising and Cash Management, Logistics and Supply Chain, and Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) considerations. By infusing ESG principles into the fabric of its approach, Digeto ensures that its partners not only succeed in new markets but also contribute positively to the global tapestry, championing sustainability and ethical practices.
Digeto’s market entry strategy service shines a light on new opportunities, guiding businesses through the complexities of establishing a foothold in new territories with strategic finesse. Its Human Resources services are crafted to cultivate a global workforce, harmonizing talent acquisition with overarching business objectives. Legal and Compliance services navigate the labyrinth of international regulations with ease, while Accounting and Tax services offer a solid foundation for financial stewardship. Fundraising and Cash Management services fuel growth and optimize resource allocation, and the Logistics and Supply Chain services ensure seamless delivery of products and services across the globe.
Partnering with Digeto opens a gateway to a host of benefits for impact-driven enterprises. The pillars of Seamless, Fast, and Cost-Effective Operational Execution underpin Digeto’s promise to its partners. By smoothing the path to global expansion, Digeto enables businesses to concentrate on their core mission, amplifying their impact without the burden of operational hurdles.
In essence, Digeto transcends the role of a mere service provider, emerging as a strategic ally for businesses poised to make a lasting positive impact on the world. It bridges the chasm between local initiatives and global presence, empowering businesses not just to envision a better world but to actively forge it. Embracing Digeto means unlocking the potential for operational excellence and sustainable growth on a global scale, where your mission-driven business can flourish and contribute to the global good.

longBusinessDescription:
Did you know that Manchester United player Juan Mata donates a part of his salary to charity? No. On the other hand, you know all about the price of Neymar's transaction with PSG or Tiger Woods's intimate antics. In Frabce, sport is often treated under a negative or accounting aspect (results) and the articles have very little substance.
That's why Sans Filtre was born in 2017. We have the will to go beyond the performer and focus on the human in order to allow fans "to (better) know their favorite athletes thanks to exclusive content thought and created by them".
On our web platform, there are written & video contents about their path to reach the top level, their passions beside sport, their associative & humanitarian commitments, their social stances and of course sport-oriented subjects where athletes share with the reader what they feel at the moment of a competition.
But also poignant editorials from our journalists, straightforward sports news, and a whole range of original content for sports fans.
More than 200,000 readers read us every month and discover the stories our journalists tell or the hundreds of sportsmen and women who have confided in us.

name: Insusty
businessDescription:
Mission : We want to change where you buy from and integrate climate action in your daily life to achieve the 2050 net zero emission goal.
How? : By encouraging you to offset your carbon footprint to receive loyalty points to buy from sustainable brands. (Coalition loyalty program for climate action)
longBusinessDescription:
Sanghmitra Bhardwaj, CEO, Founder, 100% equity holder at Insusty. Coming from a small village in the foothills of Himalayas where she witnessed climate change disasters. She is a computer science engineer who did dual masters in finance and ESG, she is currently doing her PhD on ESG analysis and disclosures for SMEs using Machine Learning.
Problem 1 : The blame game leading to no climate action, perception of individuals that sustainable products are expensive.
Problem 2 : Lack of early visibility, transparency, problem of greenwashing for sustainable brands
Solution 1: Reward based climate action
Solution 2 : Early visibility on the platform and early customers through loyalty point system that allows users to receive discounts to try sustainable products.
Transparency is ensured through Insusty’s ESG Analysis tool.
tags: Reward based carbon offsetting for individuals

name: METASENDER
businessDescription:
Send thousands of tokens or NFTs to multiple addresses in a single transaction!
 
Need to send your tokens to different addresses in batch? The MetaSender Dapp automates the process for you so you can save a massive amount of time and money.
 
Test MetaSender for free!
Batch transfer your tokens to a max of 10 different addresses for free.
 
Optimized and Secure
Our contract has been built and audited to guarantee you a minimum fee per transaction and maximum security.
 
24h Support
You got a question? Our team is available at any time. Just hit the chat button to start a conversation.
longBusinessDescription:
Four simple steps to batch send your tokens
1/ PREPARE
Connect your wallet and select the assets type and blockchain. Then simply enter the token contract address and the list of the recipient's addresses.
2/ ESTIMATE
Once the addresses are entered, hit the send button to get an estimation of your transaction cost.
3/ APPROVE
Then approved the connection and the transaction via your Metamask interface to start sending your tokens.
4/ SEND
The transfer will be completed in 3-5 minutes. We will provide you with the transaction link so you can follow the transfer.

As a result, the sequestered CO2 can be sold to companies that wish to contribute towards carbon neutrality and lead to more sustainable agriculture and a better planet.

NetCarbon aims to contribute towards carbon neutrality by offering farmers a free solution for measuring and monetizing their sequestered carbon
 
 NetCarbon’s solution measures CO2 using a cutting-edge fusion of satellite data (Sentinel-2 & PlanetScope) and state-of-the-art algorithms.

name: Pautions
businessDescription: Pautions est une alternative innovante et économique au traditionnel dépôt de garantie pour les locataires en quête d'un logement. Cette start-up met à disposition des locataires une assurance Zéro Dépôt qui permet de remplacer le paiement d'un dépôt de garantie par une assurance mensuelle dont le montant est nettement plus bas. En optant pour cette solution, les locataires peuvent ainsi économiser des sommes considérables qui peuvent être utilisées pour d'autres dépenses liées à leur emménagement.
longBusinessDescription:
En quelques clics seulement, les locataires peuvent s'inscrire sur la plateforme de Pautions sans avoir à fournir de documents supplémentaires. Accessible à tous, cette assurance Zéro Dépôt est un moyen simple et efficace pour protéger les locataires contre les éventuelles dégradations du bien immobilier loué. De plus, elle offre une protection juridique et une assistance en cas de difficultés rencontrées lors de la location.
L'assurance Zéro Dépôt est une solution innovante et pratique qui élimine la nécessité de verser un dépôt de garantie lors de la signature d'un bail. En effet, avec l'accord du propriétaire / gestionnaire, les locataires peuvent souscrire à cette assurance en ligne en quelques étapes simples et rapides, sans avoir à fournir de justificatifs de revenus ou de garanties supplémentaires. Ainsi, cette solution permet à chacun de se prémunir contre les risques de dégradations ou de litiges qui peuvent survenir durant la période de location.
En proposant une alternative au traditionnel dépôt de garantie, Pautions permet aux locataires de disposer de plus de liquidités pour faire face aux autres frais liés à leur installation, tout en offrant une protection efficace contre les éventuelles dégradations du bien loué. En somme, Pautions est un choix judicieux pour tous les locataires qui cherchent à optimiser leur budget et à se protéger contre les imprévus lors de leur location.

name: Fiveoffices
businessDescription: Fiveoffices met en relation des entreprises qui souhaitent monétiser leurs espaces de bureaux vides avec des entreprises qui cherchent des bureaux flexibles à louer pour des durées de 2 à 24 mois.
longBusinessDescription:
Vous cherchez une solution durable, facile, économique et sans engagement pour la location de bureaux au sein de votre entreprise ? Fiveoffices est la plateforme qu'il vous faut !
Notre plateforme proptech met en relation des entreprises qui souhaitent monétiser leurs espaces de bureaux vides avec des entreprises qui cherchent à louer des espaces de travail flexibles pour des durées de 2 à 24 mois. Nous offrons une alternative au coworking et une solution idéale pour mettre en place le flexoffice dans votre entreprise.
En louant vos bureaux vides sur notre plateforme, vous pouvez trouver rapidement des locataires et générer un revenu supplémentaire pour votre entreprise. De plus, en partageant votre bureau avec une autre entreprise, vous réduisez votre impact carbone et vos coûts fixes.
Chez Fiveoffices, nous croyons en la mise en relation d'entreprises qui partagent des valeurs communes et qui peuvent s'épanouir en évoluant dans les mêmes locaux. Nous nous efforçons de vous fournir une expérience de location de bureau facile, rapide et économique, tout en vous offrant la flexibilité dont vous avez besoin.
Notre plateforme vous permet de trouver facilement des bureaux à louer à Paris et au Luxembourg. Vous pouvez lancer une recherche basée sur vos critères et parcourir une large sélection de bureaux à louer disponibles dans le lieu de votre choix. Utilisez nos filtres avancés pour affiner votre recherche et discutez directement avec les personnes offrant des bureaux via notre messagerie pour obtenir plus d'informations avant de visiter et de vous installer dans votre futur espace de travail.
En choisissant Fiveoffices, vous pouvez bénéficier d'une solution de location de bureau durable et sans engagement, tout en ayant accès à une sélection de bureaux flexibles faciles à louer. Laissez-nous vous aider à trouver votre espace de travail idéal dans le bureau de quelqu'un d'autre et à réduire vos coûts et votre impact environnemental.
En conclusion, Fiveoffices est la solution idéale pour les entreprises qui cherchent à louer un espace de travail flexible, économique et durable ou pour les entreprises qui cherchent à monétiser leurs bureaux vides. En utilisant notre plateforme, vous pouvez trouver rapidement un espace de travail situé à proximité des transports en commun et réduire votre empreinte carbone. De plus, notre approche innovante de la mise en relation d'entreprises partageant des valeurs communes peut aider à créer un environnement de travail productif et épanouissant pour tous les acteurs impliqués. Essayez Fiveoffices dès maintenant et découvrez comment notre solution de location de bureau peut aider votre entreprise à réussir.
tags: flexoffice, coworking, bureaux à louer, bureaux partagés

CarbonWorks develops an industrial platform for CO2 capture by microalgal photosynthesis - CO2 is recovered into natural raw materials on a large scale 5 years R&D, breakthrough innovations, CarbonWorks benefits from the cutting-edge expertise of Suez and Fermentalg. 
CarbonWorks enables industry to develop effective and safe bioproducts at scale, and its users to reduce their carbon footprint.

Using the latest in computer vision technology, we're developing an AI coach that observes what you are doing and provides you with instant biomechanical feedback, allowing you to work out and improve your skills — anytime, anyplace.

A key difference between BUNKAI and other sports and healthcare related apps is that BUNKAI creates an effective feedback loop with the user, as if they were working out together in person. While plenty of apps can tell you what to do, only a select few can observe what you are doing using your device's camera. Where BUNKAI stands out is that it creates a complete feedback loop between itself and the user, using a combination of audio, text and visual aides to help the user in real-time, or afterwards when they look back at their achievements.
tags: Artificial Intelligence, Computer Vision, Fitness, Health Care

Bolero Music brings fans closer to their favourite artists and let them share their success.

Our ambition is to become the world leading music fans app. The first step on this journey is to make Blockchain seamless and accessible for everybody who loves Music. Music powered by people.

Founded in 2021 in France, Paris – BEOMI HEALTH  is a digital health company specializing in creating high-quality, integrated digital solutions for women’s health and their family care. We’re looking to create the best possible solutions to improve women’s experiences and make human experiences of pregnancy, birth, and family life easier and more enjoyable.

name: Aviwell
businessDescription:
Aviwell's mission is to develop healthy, native, natural, and sustainable solutions to improve animal health and growth to better nourish the planet At a fraction of the cost. Mother Nature knows best and the role of researchers is to understand how it works.  While preparing for their migration, geese have the ability to naturally store their energy in their livers, in the form of fat.  

Our research has shown that food energy can be stored in the body thanks to bacteria in our intestine: the intestinal flora, a contributor to our wellbeing.  Aviwell researchers have applied this discovery to the goose to identify ferment that will result in a naturally fat foie gras. Thus, Aviwell is launching a new product that combines gustative qualities and ethical values.  

These values, dear to Aviwell, will be guaranteed across the whole procedure: from the centre of research, representing the real DNA of the company, to the breeding by partner goose farmers, to the final stage of direct marketing.  The excellence of this new delicacy will unfold in a variety of new products, thanks to our R&D activities.

Simpler, smarter and more structuring. Our clients are mid-sized French companies and large accounts, in the areas of services, software development, health and care business or Insurance.

As there is not an unique way to be a CISO, there are also many ways to use AugmentedCISO. 
Some companies use the AugmentedCISO solution to create and share cybersecurity dashboards that are more relevant than ever, others use the platform's capabilities to accelerate their compliance and maintain it over time.
