name: Nijta
businessDescription: Nijta offers voice anonymization solutions to businesses in order to help them foster a trustful relationship with their customers, while abiding by European values and data regulations. Potential market segments include contact centres who may want to hide their callers’ identity, TV and radio media organisations who broadcast the voice of policemen, witnesses and other citizens, and voice assistants manufacturers who collect the voice samples of the users of their smart speakers. Our solution quickly removes speaker’s biometric information from their voice data and ensures that they cannot be re-identified using their voice, while preserving attributes of speech useful for training and metadata extraction which may be desired to improve customer’s experience. We currently follow a Business-to-Business (B2B) model where the customer organisations will be provided with three different options for the deployment of the voice anonymization technology: a software as a service (SaaS) solution running on the cloud hosted by Nijta, a locally installable solution running on the client’s infrastructure, and an embedded solution capable of running on small, mobile devices.

The fight against deforestation and desertification, soil fertilization, the creation of carbon sinks, or even the production of carbon-positive agriculture are all objectives that From Sand to Green pursues daily through its local plantations, sustainable and profitable.

Thnity aggregates and consumes a multitude of mobility data coming from different sources, such as open-data, transit-authorities and user-generated data to map an exhaustive real-time transit network that allows mobility and business stakeholders to best adapt their products and services to the needs of their customers.

Employees are submitted to real world conditions when facing the phishing simulation, allowing for a more realistic training and results. Based on multiple factors (campaign difficulty, user behavior, etc.), a security score is established and updated, allowing to understand and visualize its progress and the training ROI. Arsen also offers phishing reporting plugins for Microsoft Office 365 and Gmail.

name: Addingwell
businessDescription:
Addingwell is a GTM server-side fully managed Cloud Service.
The easiest, fastest, and most cost-efficient way to run GTM server-side in production. Democratizing server-side tagging and its benefits.
longBusinessDescription:
If you use Google Tag Manager for your tags, it would be wise to open a server-side container to improve your web performance and have an absolute control tower between your website and your partners.
To help you take this step in the most tranquil way possible, Addingwell comes to help you on three themes:
- Setting up the infrastructure necessary for the optimal functioning of Google Tag Manager server-side
- The monitoring of this infrastructure to have fast tagging servers that can scale up quickly.
- The monitoring of your different tags ensures that your server receives the data and transmits it to each partner.
- The monitoring of the data quality to have a complete vision of what data transits through your server and check the quality.

name: Doka Translation
businessDescription: Our agency provides quality sworn translations through our network of certified, native-speaking and certified translators. Order your sworn translation online for fast delivery.
longBusinessDescription:
A sworn translation is the official translation of your documents. It allows you to authenticate these documents in another language. A sworn translation allows you to carry out many formalities such as expatriating, getting married or buying a property abroad.
The sworn translation must be done by a certified translator who has been sworn in by a Court of Appeal.
At Doka Translation, our translators are rigorously selected. All of our translators are certified and translate only into their native language. They have also been sworn in by a Court of Appeal in their region. We guarantee a high level of quality in every sworn translation we deliver.
Order your sworn translations online through our platform.

E-Space is also on a mission to keep our space green, they claim that they can build collision-resistant satellites that by default should not break apart and set off a catastrophic chain reaction of satellites being struck by space debris.

name: LaCollection
businessDescription:
Paris-based LaCollection is creating a new way of owning digital versions of a physical artwork by working with cultural institutions. Like a limited edition “digital lithography”, collectors are now able to own certified digital twins of masterpieces from the world’s greatest museums, galleries and artists.

LaCollection also entered into an exclusive agreement with The British Museum and has achieved a 7 digits revenue in 4 months with an NFT sale dedicated to the work of Japanese painter Katsushika Hokusai. 

To start a collection on LaCollection, users can sign up for an account in seconds, and begin purchasing non-fungible token (NFT) of paintings by Hokusai, Turner and more, using a simple credit card. Each NFT is unique, scarce, and its ownership is publicly verifiable via the Ethereum blockchain. It is a secure and transparent model of digital ownership.

NFT is the hot-topic of moment, and while some of the trends in this space can seem a little off-beat, LaCollection is certainly brining a touch of culture and sophistication to the sector. Further, the art NFT space has seen spectacular growth in the last few months, and it looks like its going to keep going with interest in the sector continuing to pick up. LaCollection has rapidly stood out by providing a unique highly tailored model away from traditional marketplaces, amidst the general lack of curation in this brand new space.

name: Octolis
businessDescription:

We provide our clients with a packaged modern data stack to structure, smarten and sync their data in

longBusinessDescription:
- We believe that the growth of modern cloud data warehouses will deeply transform organizations.
When all the company’s data is stored in a warehouse, you can use this warehouse to manage all your
teams and sync all your tools. Octolis acts as a sort of data logistician.
- We will enable small businesses (SMBs) to become genuinely “data-driven”. Not to create reports that
are barely used, not to create yet another machine learning POC that will never be put into practice, but to improve everyday operations.
- We have developed the data management solution we wish we had in our previous experiences. It’s a
simple enough solution to be used by marketers and flexible enough for tech/data teams.

name: Satoshi Studio
businessDescription:
We started Satoshi Studio in September 2018, in Paris.
We’re designers, engineers, creatives, working together to advance transparency in the fashion and textile industry. We use blockchain for widespread public benefit and discovery and collaborate with others on critical challenges, ensuring sustainability and ethics are the highest priority. Our goal is to build with our partners the infrastructure that will allow brands to be more circular and publicly transparent in a format designed for the digital age.

We create high-quality products by working directly with the best artisans in Europe and sell them at a fair price by cutting out all intermediates. We empower our community by turning customers into decision-makers and stakeholders.
Direct-to-consumer sneakers brand focusing on sustainability and digital experience. Its goal is to operate a crowdfunding-inspired model, driven by demand and data.

Each Satoshi Studio product has its own digital twin (NFT). Satoshi Studio is developing a circular model, create new incentives that reduce production and waste, and track products at all stages of their lifecycle.
The company was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Paris, France.

name: ProctorSafe
businessDescription: ProctorSafe is an online proctoring solution with no private data collection
longBusinessDescription:
Proctoring is often associated with data privacy concerns.
Taking a radically new approach, ProctorSafe offers an efficient solution with no private data collection.
The browser-based service analyzes all the data directly on the user’s device, only sending anonymous alert signals to ProctorSafe’s servers.
Pictures, videos, face-detection points or any other biometric data never leave their device.
For ProctorSafe a user is only a number, nothing else.
This is the perfect association of proctoring and data privacy respect.
Any learning or exam system can integrate ProctorSafe directly in their platform within minutes.

economical and ecological  houses.

name: TOZEX
businessDescription:
Tozex is the next generation of crowdfunding platforms. Tozex is a unique fundraising platform that uses Blockchain Technology to allows SMEs to raise capital and provide liquidity for their stocks.

Despite playing a major role in the economy, small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) still suffer from a deep funding shortfall. The combination of non-reliable public information and complex share transferability mechanisms doesn’t attract investors because of the illiquid nature of SMEs' stocks.
SMEs had not so far, few financing tools are at their disposal until the emergence of token-based fundraising mechanism, most well known as Initial Token Offering (In 2018, almost 21 billion dollars, have been raised to finance up to 900 projects). This new method is an important step for the global finance ecosystem towards the decentralization of finance. However, current access to this new powerful fundraising way remains very scattered, costly, and opaque.

Tozex platform allows to manage entire token life cycle (primary and secondary market) within one unique automated and fully regulated platform. No specific skills needed and cost-efficient.
tags: crowdfunding platforms, fundraising platform, Blockchain Technology, stocks

- No access to our users' data
- Military grade cryptography
- Archiving in an offline safe

name: Glanceable
businessDescription:
Glanceable is a SaaS company that uses natural language processing to compile and analyze millions of reviews and comments. Glanceable combines all public and private/internal data on a single platform. Glanceable is headquartered in Saint-mande, France and was founded in 2020.


Our Values

Science

We Move Forward with Science 
Glanceable prides itself on putting research and innovation first. Our AI experts are constantly developing new ways to leverage data, providing you with innovative solutions. Our platform is an "intelligent" machine, continuously learning from data and growing from experience.

Speed

Driven by Efficiency
Every moment spent on a SaaS platform has to be meaningful, which is why we built our platform with performance and responsiveness in mind. With Glanceable, every click, search or glance provides you with immediate results.

Simplicity

We Filter Out the Noise
Our platform extracts valuable information from complex and unstructured data to help you focus on what matters; less is more. Simplicity is at the core of our interface design. Every tool, layout and click was built for an intuitive, seamless user experience.

Versatility

Accessible 
to Everyone
Glanceable is designed to work for everyone, whether for a small or large company, a restaurant or an app, at the brand or product level. Our platform is built for flexibility and can be configured to address your pain points.

Our Story

Reading many reviews and making decisions regarding products or businesses can be time consuming and frustrating. To solve this problem, we initially founded Glanceable to make purchasing decisions easier, faster and more effective for consumers. 

We then started to offer a B2B solution in order to help companies improve their understanding of customer’s needs. After years of research and development, we have created a cutting-edge AI-system which provides key pain points and actionable insights. Using a simple, fast and uniquely designed platform, Glanceable unifies customer feedback from all platforms across all industries.

name: La Touche Musicale
businessDescription: Learn piano easily with the songs you love.
longBusinessDescription:
La Touche Musicale is the easiest way to learn piano with the songs you love.
La Touche Musicale is one of the best piano learning apps. Connect your keyboard to the app and learn to play your favorite songs from over 3000 titles. The method is suitable for all levels, from beginner to advanced.
What does the app contain?
- More than 3000 songs of all genres (rock, jazz, movies and television, classical music, anime and manga, cartoons, video games...) and for all levels
- Notes and chords to play for each of these songs
- Interactive lessons that allow you to play at your own pace
- Instant feedback on your playing
How does the app work?
1 - Download the app
2 - Place your smartphone, tablet or computer on your keyboard
3 - Choose a song at your level (easy, medium, difficult or expert)
4 - Activate the microphone so that the application listens to the notes you play or connect your piano to your device via a MIDI-USB cable.
5 - Configure the learning features to your liking (speed, loop, hand choice, metronome, ...)
6 - Play the notes and chords that appear on the screen
7 - Receive feedback and improve your playing
The advantages of La Touche Musicale
- Easy and fast learning
- No need for prior knowledge of music theory
- A very complete catalog of songs
- Dozens of new songs every week
- Powerful learning features
- Learn at your own pace according to your level
- Try over 250 free songs and piano tutorials
- Access your account from all your devices
- Professional staff to help you progress every day
Overview of songs to play on La Touche Musicale
- Classical music : Beethoven, Mozart, Bach, Vivaldi, ...
- Films and series : A Star Is Born, Avengers, Twilight, La La Land, Inception, ...
- Pop : Adele, Ed Sheeran, Billie Eilish, ...
- Anime & manga : Naruto, Attack on Titan, Your Lie in April, ...
- Children and cartoons : Frozen, The Lion King, Pokemon, ...
Overview of learning features
- Piano connection: connect your own keyboard via MIDI-USB cable to interact with the virtual piano and learn at your own pace
- Microphone function: Don't have a MIDI-USB cable? Activate your microphone and let it guide you.
- Learning mode: the application waits for you until you play the right notes on your keyboard
- Slow motion: play at slow speed to get comfortable with a song
- Loop function: replay a specific passage until you master it
- Play one hand at a time - play while working on your left and right hands separately
- Personalized tracking: get instant feedback, identify your mistakes and track your progress
- Metronome: learn to play at the right rhythm and tempo
BECOME A PREMIUM MEMBER AND REACH YOUR FULL POTENTIAL AS A PIANIST
La Touche Musicale's Premium membership gives you access to the entire catalog of songs (more than 3,000 titles) and to powerful learning features. To become a Premium member, you have 3 options:
- 1 month: 9,99€/month
- 6 months: 7,99€/month
- 12 months: 5,99€/month
Each subscription is automatically extended without any cancellation on your part. If you cancel your subscription, your access to the songs and features of the Premium offer will end at the end of the current period.
With La Touche Musicale, learning piano has never been easier or more fun. Join a community of committed pianists always ready to help you, whatever your level, from beginner to advanced.

longBusinessDescription:
Wisefins aims to transform the world of hospitality by converting it into a clean and compassionate industry by 2050.
We combine the use of ancient practices and clean technology to transform the hotel industry.
The objective is to achieve full sustainable self-reliance through tech integration and circular economies for each and every project we are involved in.
WiseFins is the only hospitality startup that creates and manages sustainable, health enhancing, wildlife-friendly and community centric hotel and restaurant brands.
We also offer consulting and project management services in the hospitality and restaurant industry, solely focused on assisting organizations to adopt Clean Technologies and sustainable practices.
At WiseFins we believe we all have the responsibility to use our knowledge, expertise and skills as tools to better the health of our planet and the life of its inhabitants.
Hence, we rely on our expertise in hospitality, project and people management to build strong partnerships to integrate the most advanced clean technology.
In order to reach our objectives of self-reliance we follow the 3 Zeros philosophy:
Zero Kilometers: nearness of materials and skills.
Zero CO2: Energy management and reduction of emissions.
Zero Waste: life-cycle management in processes and reuse of materials.
WiseFins is transforming hospitality into a clean and compassionate industry by 2050 and we do it with sincerity, integrity and full transparency. We are committed to seeing long-term positive outcomes on the environment, the health of our local and international communities and, of course, enhancing the strength of our partners.
tags: Self-reliant, Hotel, Technology, Circular Economies, Sustainability

name: Vitademia
businessDescription: A cloud academy enabling students of life to learn fundamental life skills and wisdom, guided by retirees rich in life experiences, acting as their coaches and mentors.
longBusinessDescription:
In March 2020, I came up with the idea to empower retirees by enabling them to act as life coaches and mentors to their younger peers, who are seeking for answers to help them grow and overcome life challenges. 
In current society, the two most vulnerable age groups are young people in their 20s and senior citizens in retirement, with loneliness being one of the root problems.
For the younger generation, social media has consumed a significant portion of their daily communication with others, meaning people are talking less in real life than before. This leads to severe self-isolation and quite often the inability to find the right answers to hurdle the many obstacles we face during our life journey. With multigenerational households becoming less and less common, particularly in developed countries, sharing knowledge and wisdom between different age groups is becoming severely stunted. 
For the elder generation, this also has significant impact in the sense that they feel less and less purposeful in society after retirement. Retirees often feel left behind and share a sense of abandonment if they are not digitally competent. This is not to say they are isolated, because retirement homes and communities have been rapidly growing. However, this segregation by age is having a negative impact on society, as intergenerational communication and understanding are being stifled, day by day.
To sum this all up, generation gaps have never grown so rapidly in human history amid the exponential growth in technology. However, I strongly believe that we can lessen this gap by doing the following:
- building more communication channels between the young and old
- showing more appreciation for wisdom and knowledge gained through life experiences
- empowering retirees with essential skill set to communicate effectively in the digital age
Vitademia aims to provide a library of e-learning courses that tackle some of life's most difficult challenges. These courses would be developed by retirees who provide their wisdom in written form. Learners can "study" these courses at their own time online, whilst being guided by a team of dedicated coaches and mentors who specialise in the given subject. Coaching and mentoring sessions will take place online using video conferencing tools such as Skype, Google Hangouts or Zoom.

name: Qinaps
businessDescription: Qinaps is a networked note-taking application for delivering flexible documents
longBusinessDescription:
A Qinaps user can:-
• Create a workspace where they can manage workbooks.
• Within a workbook, information is stored in components or nodes.
• As you keep adding more components, a spatial representation of your information begins to emerge resembling a map of all your information similar to a Table of Content.
• This 'Map' can be broken down further into several viewpoints to create smaller clusters of components to focus on.
• The information within your workbook has several representations: Map, Table, Document.
🤩 Now for the fun stuff for teams and individuals:-
• Create and store pieces of information, videos, links, and images, code snippets
• Share information with teams, or with the world with sharable links!
• Deliver multiple documents by cherry-picking components from your Map.
• One may think of it as a knowledgebase where notes, articles, data sources, team discussions, reference links are stored and categorized. • As the user progresses while ideating and working, information can be re-arranged freely to deliver professional documents. They can be kept current, regardless of how information is re-arranged, customized, enriched, and versioned.

businessDescription: API Aggregator that lets developers query many data-sources through a single endpoint. GraphQL Portal generates automatically a single GraphQL schema and endpoint. Developers can then access all of those data-sources using a single GraphQL query. For example they can query Salesforce clients, with their orders in Magento and stock levels from SAP. Use cases cover apps or sites (mobile, PWA) which consume more than 2 APIs.

name: TradeIn
businessDescription: Supported by Google for Startups, TradeIn is the only fintech that offers complete management of the risk of non-payment in real time, and solutions for financing your cash flow. We offer a collaborative instant assessment platform Each year, more than 50,000 VSEs / SMEs go bankrupt in France. These bankruptcies are due, for 25% of them, to late payments or unpaid customers. The cash flow difficulties of clients or prospects of VSEs / SMEs endanger the sustainability of VSEs / SMEs isolated in the face of customer credit risk. Faced with this situation, the TradeIn platform structures digital risk management offers in order to better protect its clients from the risks inherent in the cash flow difficulties of their trading partners. Our offer : Prevention of customer credit risks o Financial information on prospects / customers o Rating of risks linked to the payment behavior of customers / prospects o Risk alerts on the customer portfolio Risk pooling o Credit insurance 2.0: Full digital / no paper process o Compensation 2.0: On average 15 days up to 95% of the guaranteed debt o Debt collection o Beneficiary participation: Up to 30% of premium paid Funding o Optimized factoring solution “WITH TRADEIN, YOU WILL NEVER BE ALONE ANYMORE FACING THE RISK OF UNPAID INVOICES ”Every year, 160 000 SMEs are dying due to unpaid invoices, causing a global loss of 430 billion dollars per year worldwide. Time has come to protect small and medium enterprises by securing their cash inflow.

They will not be transferred to company business or other organization. A cookie is a small file sent to your browser by a website you are visiting, in order to record some information about your visit, as your language, and some specific parameters, for the proper functioning of services. No precise data such as your full name, and postal addresses are obtained or recorded. Only computer and anonymous data are, for a specified period. Cookies have an important role in your navigation. Luatix uses them, for example, to remember your language preferences and to get some statistics.

businessDescription: Iome Bio is a French company that explores microbiome-based mechanisms to develop new drugs in immuno-oncology. Immune checkpoint blockade with PD/L-1 therapies such as Keytruda and Opdivo can induce complete and durable clinical responses in multiple tumors, a breakthrough in cancer treatment over the last decade. However, only around 20% of patients respond and many trials have failed. Iome-Bio offers a differentiated approach through a targeted mode of action downstream of the microbiome’s action, enabling amplification of the signal with first in class monoclonal antibodies.

Our products allow to reduce the echo of a room.
longBusinessDescription:
We offer products for individuals and professionals. The objective of our products is twofold:
1- Improve the tranquillity of a room
2- Improve the musical qualities of a piece
Noise is a major problem in our society today. Numerous studies have shown its harmful effects. Thus, more than one employee out of two is negatively affected by noise at work. This causes stress, illness, hearing loss and loss of productivity.
Sound quality is also important for music and hi-fi. Our products can therefore improve the fidelity of the sound reproduction of music.
We differentiate ourselves from the competition because :
1- We have designed totally ecological products
2- We use materials that are not dangerous for the health of the users (no glass wool or rock wool)
3- We use a unique technology that allows us to reduce the thickness by 10 times while obtaining the same performance: our products are not intrusive in a room.
4- Our products are easy to install and respectful of the walls: they can be moved around.
5- Our products are recommended by the specialized press

name: Wiink

At Wiink, we challenge the notion that the traditional top-down brand-to-consumer marketing model holds any relevance today. It has become outdated and ineffective. Modern consumers seek intimacy, trust, and turn to their peers for recommendations. That's why we are committed to redefining the approach to referral programs and paving the way for a more progressive marketing era.
Our core belief revolves around the power of personalized community building. We offer a space where you can recruit and engage brand ambassadors, fostering a profound sense of belonging and connection. Through engaging in missions and unlocking rewards through gamification, these ambassadors actively contribute to your brand's growth. This unique peer-to-peer advertising approach amplifies market voice, boosts engagement, and enhances social conversion.
At Wiink, we prioritize the individual consumer's influence. We're shifting our focus from a brand-centric approach to a customer-centric one. By understanding and valuing the needs of your customers, you can establish lasting and effective strategies for acquiring and retaining them.
Join us in embracing this movement towards a customer-centric marketing approach. Together, we can empower your community to become a thriving growth engine, paving the way for a brighter future for your brand.

This unique dual-algorithm approach enables MusicDatak to provide highly accurate and relevant predictive analytics, helping radio stations identify potential hits, understand audience preferences, and optimize their playlists for maximum listener engagement. The company's commitment to client-centric innovation ensures that its tools are both practical and innovative, continuously refined based on real-world feedback.

Yet 80% of women are still hesitant to travel alone because of 'safety', 'cost' and 'loneliness'. NomadHer believes that traveling with adventures and challenges makes people grow. We hope that more women will gain independence, self confidence and learn who they really are through solo traveling. That's why there's NomadHer, a global female globetrottersâ€™ application. NomadHer has the following features: # GLOBAL FEMALE GLOBETROTTERS' COMMUNITY - Feel free to talk to female travelers all over the world about your past travel stories, worries about solo traveling, recommendations and tips! # CHAT WITH OTHER FEMALE TRAVELERS AROUND YOU - You can easily connect with other female travelers or local women around you through our messenger. Make friends with other fellow female travelers while traveling alone! # LOOK FOR ACCOMMODATION RUN BY FEMALE HOSTS - You can book a safe accommodation run by a female host! You can also become a host yourself and welcome other female travelers to your home. # VARIOUS EVENTS FOR FEMALE TRAVELERS - You can participate in a variety of events, including workshops, festivals, online picnics and more! NomadHer is a privacy-focused group where women can honestly share their stories. In NomadHer supporting each other with mutual respect is a priority rule. name: EG 427
businessDescription:
EG 427 is a French biotechnology company that pioneers a new approach in gene therapy called pinpoint gene therapy. By exploiting the natural properties of Herpes Simplex Virus 1 (HSV-1), notably its ability to establish lifelong latency in peripheral neurons, EG 427 ensures highly specific and durable expression of the transgene to treat, in the long run, patients with severe, chronic and localized diseases, starting with peripheral nervous system disorders.  

One year after its inception, EG 427 has already built its proprietary HSV-1 vector platform and achieved the preclinical proof of its concept in the most common type of neurogenic bladder (urinary bladder dysfunction due to supra-sacral spinal cord injury). Today, the company is evaluating the potential of pinpoint gene therapy in other indications that involve different compartments of the peripheral nervous system. The company expects to start its first clinical trials by 2023. Based in Paris, EG 427 was founded by a world-renowned team in the field of HSV-1 vectorology and spinal cord injury-related disorders.

6 interface languages (several customizable options for even more languages) - with even more languages to come & easy to expand upon request

name: MELLIsim
businessDescription:
MELLIsim is a start-up created to put the MELLIsense CGM solution on the market to address the huge unmet needs of Type 2 Diabetic (T2D) patients. MELLIsim’s goal is to put on the market the promising continuous glucose sensor technologies.
The MELLIsense medical device replaces multiple painful daily finger-prick glucose measurements by a wearable biosensor patch associated with a proprietary software application available on the patient smartphone.
longBusinessDescription:
MELLIsim is a start-up created to put the MELLIsense CGM (Continuous Glucose Monitoring) solution on the market to address the huge unmet needs of Type 2 Diabetic (T2D) patients. We developed our innovative glucose sensor technology in collaboration with ITODYS, one of the leading research laboratories in electrochemical biosensors in France. 
Our innovation radically changes the care of T2D patients: 70% of them with one insulin injection per day currently fail to reach a normal glycaemic control. The MELLIsense medical device replaces multiple painful daily finger-prick glucose measurements by a wearable biosensor patch associated with a proprietary Artificial Intelligence application available on the patient smartphone. 
MELLIsense’s unique combination provides patients with clinical expertise of diabetes specialists through personalised analyses and recommendations. It allows patients to leverage the best clinical practices, including a personal diabetes coach available anywhere and at any time to motivate and engage patients in their daily treatment. MELLIsim is working with the support of patient associations and renowned hospital specialists in France, Switzerland, UK and Canada.
We plan to sell our solution at the same price as the current practice with BGM (Blood Glucose Measurement) using finger-pricks to measure glycaemia, which are 2 to 8 times cheaper than competitor CGM solutions.
We validated the efficiency of the concept on Human in 2018. In 2019 we tested our biosensor during preclinical trials. In 2020, we focused on the sensor miniaturisation and on the automation of the manufacturing process. This year we will do the first in human acute tests of our sensor and continue the clinical trials in 2022. We plan to obtain CE mark and FDA approval for our CGM sensor in Q2 2023 and to deliver to patients the full MELLIsense solution by the end of 2023.
We are looking for investors, industrial and distribution partners.
tags: CGM / Medical devices/ Diabetes / Glucose Sensor / Bio sensor

businessDescription: The software automates the creation and updating of intelligent 3D model of a plant, starting from the only reliable source of information: the field. The Digital Twin as a Service offering uses machine learning to collate 3D laser scans and technical data from various sources to deliver a fully accurate 3D “Digital Twin”. The intelligent model is then turned into a web portal serving as a one-stop-shop for all players. While the As-Built automatic verification service utilizes advanced geometrical and topological algorithms, which the company's solution automatically compares the laser scans with 3D CAD models, highlighting all differences that require attention.

We render Javascript with a simple parameter so you can scrape every website, even Single Page Applications using React, AngularJS, Vue.js, or any other libraries. name: Softbuilder
businessDescription:
Softbuilder is a software development company responsible for the development and maintenance of ERBuilder, a complete visual data modeling tool. Our product supports the most popular database management systems including Oracle Database, Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL, and many more. ERBuilder Data Modeler is intended for use by software engineers, analysts, designers, architects, developers, and project managers. 
Softbuilder today announced the latest release of its Salesforce metadata exploring tool, ERBuilder for Salesforce v2.0. This major release will provide significantly enhanced capabilities for extracting and exploring metadata from Salesforce organizations. This release is designed to help to ensure that Salesforce admins, analysts, and developers can more easily and quickly understand and make use of Salesforce ER Diagram.

Here are some valuable new features on ERBuilder for Salesforce:
A new data model browsing feature: The main purpose of the Data model browser feature is to allow a full exploration of the data structure extracted from Salesforce. The advanced search feature integrated to the data model browser provides more flexible search capabilities.
Generate automatically data dictionaries for your Salesforce org on different formats (HTML, CSV, XML, JSON, TXT, SQL, and MS-EXCEL).
Conversion from Salesforce to another target Database Management System by generating DDL scripts.
And more performance improvement.

name: Skypher
businessDescription:
We're a team of passionate, product-minded people, problem solvers, and friends. We're remote friendly with two small hubs in San Francisco and Paris. Skypher’s co-founders, Gaspard and Louis, had to deal with security reviews in previous SaaS companies. Louis is a security engineer with a machine learning background and Gaspard used to fill out security reviews in the sales team of a B2B SaaS company in New York. It was a real nightmare. That's why we created Skypher to make security questionnaires pain a thing of the past, no matter the format. 
Skypher is built by people that have experienced the challenges of implementing information security best practices and responding to lengthy and complex security reviews. We understand what it takes for software companies to meet the ever-increasing demands of the customer and regulatory-driven security requirements. Our mission is to help tech companies become more secure organizations while removing the huge amount of unnecessary pain and busywork involved in cybersecurity compliance.

sKraps fits right there.

sKraps is a C2C marketplace that aims to build a community of users focused on DIY and home improvement. Our users can sell, buy, give away their goods or learn on sKraps blog how to get the most out of what they already have or can find without breaking the bank.

sKraps also allows two users with the same need to meet in order to optimize their purchases at the local store. Hence, reducing the overall waste.

‍Creativity and productivity are opposites. One requires time, the other minimizes it. One can't be measured, the other needs to be. One creates to-do lists, the other checks them off. The opposition between creativity and productivity is the fundamental tension all creatives face.

But the great change in the world happens when creators think of new ideas and get them done. So bringing creativity and productivity together - helping creatives be more productive with modern tools and methods - unlocks a vast positive change in the world. The future belongs to the creatives who will master technology to amplify their ideas. This is why Supercreative exists: to level up the next generation of creatives. CryptoNext provides a set of services and software products for a seamless transition to a quantum-safe cryptography; making your sensitive data secure for the long term. CryptoNext Security was formerly known as PQAT (Post Quantum Advanced Technologies).

businessDescription:
SUBLIME Energie is a company with a mission, which allows the creation of new local supply chains for bioNGV and bioCO 2  and gives access to the merchandisable biomass deposit from small farms located far from networks.

In a circular economy logic, our equipment makes possible a new biogas collection, transport, purification, and conditioning service, responding to environmental and climatic challenges, while increasing the resilience of the agricultural world and the energy sovereignty of the regions.

Our equipment uses the only biogas liquefaction technology in the world, which, coupled with a refrigeration recycling system,   gives it high energy efficiency and reduced operating costs.

This technology is a  paradigm shift in the biogas treatment chain insofar as it enables the efficient transport of concentrated biogas from small-scale agricultural mechanization in order to pool its purification, and thus benefit from significant scale effects.

Ugo-Fresh is the first B2B marketplace for the fruits and vegetable market with a full package of services, from fields to customers. All buyers (wholesellers, shops, restaurants...) can directly buy from growers and importers all around Europe and Africa. We control the logistic, the quality service, final delivery and we guarantee the payments. All fresh products are updated every day, UgoFresh facilitates growers and buyers to save costs and be more efficient. UgoFresh, your new digital fruit and vegetable tool that optimizes your business exchanges and automates your daily tasks. Improve easily your productivity. 

Buyer: stay connected with your suppliers. Access their offers in real-time on a single interface: get your supplies in one click.
Seller: free yourself from repetitive tasks with no added value: save time and manage more customers.
tags: B2B marketplace, delivery, fresh products, digital fruit, vegetables

name: UDINI
businessDescription: Udini’s transformational suite of digital applications is meant to redefine the possibilities of each dental practice with smart, time-saving solutions for the daily workflow. We combine clinical experience, technical expertise and superior (AI) technology to democratize medical care and shape the next generation of human practitioners. Udini helps dentists and orthodontists improve their practice through a suite of intelligent software applications. The first fully automatic orthodontic photo retouching software.
tags: automatic orthodontic, clinical experience, medical care, dentists, orthodontists

name: Axorus
businessDescription: Axorus is a French company that develops neuro-electronic interfaces for therapeutic applications. The company uses a biomimetic artificial neuron as a link between the nervous system and electronic devices or medical implants. It aims at using this technology to develop a wide range of medical implants to treat the symptoms of neurodegenerative diseases and enhance quality of life.

name: Avallen Spirits

Pleasing to everyone from gin drinkers when served long with tonic, to those who enjoy their spirits brown, or those who love fruity cocktail, Avallen is perfect for mixing, as a refreshing spritz, or simply for sipping.

name: Veesual
businessDescription:
What about using AI to create engaging and inspiring images on the spot?

This is the challenge Veesual's team is addressing with their image personalization platform based on Generation AI.

Choose a model, pick apparel, and BOOM: you have a new image.

For fashion brands and fashion retailers who need to fuel their e-commerce, social media, and communication, they create images personalized to a specific audience without additional shootings or edits.
More images, more personalization, more engagement, more sales: welcome to the era of individual marketing.

name: Vybe

It was founded in 2019 and is headquartered inCourbevoie, France.

name: Waltio
businessDescription:

With automated synchronization to exchanges and wallets, our tax bot computes net asset value / Gain and loss, provides advanced analytics dashboards, tax reporting. Waltio tracks trading and Defi products and various crypto-incomes.
Waltio allows you to calculate and declare your crypto-currency capital gains in complete safety.

name: ASKIP

The app uses a phone number as a sign-up tool and does not require the user to enter any personal details that make communication on the messenger tool completely anonymous.

name: Zama

Zama is open-source by design, as they believe privacy-enabling technologies should benefit the widest possible community of developers and researchers. At Zama, we build homomorphic encryption solutions to help companies protect their users' privacy.

And the more accurate your data gets, the clearer path to success your business takes.

name: Agora Software
businessDescription:
The place where things, services and users meet.
Agora: (in ancient Greece) a public open space used for assemblies and markets. Agora Software proposes a multi-tenant platform that brings together connected things, services and users so they can interact and collaborate openly and securely. It automatically translates natural language into machine language (and vice versa) and integrates flexible event-driven workflow capabilities across user-defined workspaces.

name: TRIP/IN
businessDescription: Trip/In generates tailored information about choices of activities (Retail, F&b, Fun) available at airports worldwide based on traveller’s preferences, available time, location (airports), constraints & environment. Airports will benefit from reports on traveller’s entire experience for a fee.
longBusinessDescription:
Billions of travellers will continue flowing through airports globally. According to the Airport Council International, within the next 10 years, we will reach 14 billion in annual traffic. Airports are becoming Aerocities. How will we manage this expansion and heavy flow of travellers? How will we improve traveller’s experience? How will we help travel port generating more revenue? Trip/In is a travel companion which gives tailored and optimised information about what choices of retail and other activities are available at travel ports (airports and railway stations) based on time spent at a particular airport. The platform will improve traveller’s journey experience and increase travel ports revenue using a predictive algorithm
& recommendation model to improve its business and keep travellers happy. Our service will improve conversion, offer extended contents, will avail a communication channel between travel ports and travellers (messaging platforms).
tags: agregators, travel companion, passenger experience, travel hospitality, traveller journey

name: Kriptown
businessDescription: Kriptown aims to facilitate fundraising to innovative companies while providing liquidity to investors through a secondary market.
longBusinessDescription:
Have you ever heard of liquid stocks for startups?
No? That’s normal!
Regulatory restrictions & cost barriers make it almost impossible for startups to be quoted on a secondary market through traditional channels.
Therefore a high risk of liquidity is present on the financial market of young startups which could deter investors.
This is why we’ve adapted ourselves to the legislation in order to give the  startup a liquid stock market.
Thanks to a proprietary blockchain technology and a strong legal and financial know-how.
We present: ITO (Initial Token Offering)
Thanks to the use of tokens, Kriptown offers a simpler access to fundraising for Startups and a secondary Market that provides liquidity for investors.

name: Top Graduate
businessDescription: Combining recruiting, freelancing and employer brand solutions, Top Graduate simplifies the connection between companies and students.
longBusinessDescription: Combining recruiting, freelancing and employer brand solutions, Top Graduate simplifies the connection between companies and students. Our mission is to increase students' employability by connecting them to companies which are looking for talents. Top Graduate, The young talent empowerment platform. www.topgraduate.co

name: HODLNG, a blockchain for LNG
businessDescription: We ensure carbon-neutrality of an LNG cargo
longBusinessDescription:
For Gas Sellers eager to help Gas Buyers decarbonize their LNG cargos, HODLNG built a solution to consolidate GHG compliance statements and pegged as carbon offsets – and other ESG credits - to LNG gas orders.
We've designed HODLNG to help sellers offer a whole or partial carbon-free LNG cargo as buyers requests.
HODLNG uses blockchain to manage, track, and seamlessly hand over offsets until an end customer's ESG accounting system.
HODLNG empowers market-makers to play a leading role in the fight against the climate crisis.

name: Belive.ai

name: Pixacare

Elles sont dans les galeries personnelles mélangées aux photos de vacances, non triées, non identifiées et encore moins sécurisées. Pourtant, ces données sont cruciales pour prendre des décisions autour des pathologies cutanées.Pour les médecins et les infirmier·ères qui utilisent leurs smartphones pour documenter le suivi visuel des photos médicales des patients, Pixacare est une application qui organise, sécurise et analyse ces photos. Elle aide à mesurer et à analyser le contenu des plaies tout en permettant de suivre à distance la progression des lésions.

name: Not So Dark

Our aim is to improve the daily lives of urban people by bringing a more pleasurable and satisfying at-home dining experience. We do this by combining smart tech, data analytics, market research and food industry knowledge to make online food delivery more profitable for operators and more pleasurable for diners.

name: Plum Kitchen
businessDescription: Plum Kitchen is developing a high-end fully catered interior design services platform. It is the first Interior Design platform that will provide you with all you need to be your own interior designer and create a unique place.

name: Arkhn
businessDescription:

Arkhn gives back sovereignty to healthcare establishments over their data to better support patients, facilitate the work of healthcare professionals and accelerate research.
The current health data system is characterized by a multitude of silo-based medical software vendors using their own proprietary database format.

name: Venture Orbital Systems
businessDescription: Venture Orbital Systems is developing a reactive, reliable, and cost-efficient nano-launcher dedicated to the CubeSat market. Venture Orbital Systems is a space technology company that offers launch solutions for nanosatellites. Performance and timing are defining our services. You're in command.

name: RATATOOL
businessDescription:
Ratatool is born from the idea that no easy online tool is available for restaurant owners to manage their daily recipe professional forms and evaluate their recipe costs .

The main objective is to make the tool the simplest, the clearest and the most complete possible to provide recipe cost calculations and to simplify day to day adjustments, share technical recipe forms with instructions, increase productivity.
longBusinessDescription:
Main features :
- Manage your recipe technical forms (permanent online availability on all your devices)
- Manage your ingredients with your supplier info (purchasing and nutritional data)
- Set your prices and evaluate your cost and margin indicators
- Generate your purchase orders from the revenue quantities
- Print your documents (listings, recipes / ingredients, data sheets, order forms)
- Automatically add nutrition tags ​​(USDA basis) by ingredients and get the value per recipe

name: Armada Lex
businessDescription:
Armada Lex offers simple, practical and secure dedicated tools that facilitate the work of your legal, financial or human resources teams and allow the emergence of contractual relationships with a high number of counterparties (digital signing of all kind of documents within the context of simple or complex transactions : commercial agreements, employment contracts, PoA, SPA, shareholders agreements or complex agreements in the context of initial public offerings, takeovers or offers reserved for employees etc.).

With a financial and legal DNA, our teams also design tailor-made digital solutions that facilitate the implementation of capital or commercial transactions in conjunction with your banks, account holders, tax advisors and legal advisors.
longBusinessDescription:
Armada Lex offers simple, practical and secure dedicated tools that facilitate the work of your legal, financial or human resources teams and allow the emergence of contractual relationships with a high number of counterparties (digital signing of all kind of documents within the context of simple or complex transactions : commercial agreements, employment contracts, PoA, SPA, shareholders agreements or complex agreements in the context of initial public offerings, takeovers or offers reserved for employees etc.).

businessDescription:

We streamline the way professionals request, collect, approve, and manage stakeholders' information, documents, contracts, payments, and more, as part of their day-to-day operations.

Used in 70+ countries, great reviews, affordable plans, free trial, no credit card required, cancel anytime.

name: HelioRec
businessDescription:
HelioRec solution is a sustainable, rapid-to-deploy, and cost-effective source of power generation.

We are developers of a  new concept: Offshore floating solar power plant manufactured from recycled Plastic and we aim to: 
- Save land space by deploying the power plant on the sea
- Produce “green” electricity from the mature technology – solar energy
- Manage plastic waste through using recycled plastic for the floating structures

HelioRec is a member of the World Alliance  at  Solar Impulse Foundation.

Our CEO, winner of of the first Women in Green Tech International Awards, believes  that Offshore floating solar is the next new sector in the energy industry, alongside the wind energy sector (land, offshore and now - floating offshore) and other sectors.

name: GoyaLab
businessDescription: GoyaLab is an innovant company who is expert in spectroscopy. Its GoSpectro solution makes more accessible spectrometry. Now you can analyze spectrum with smartphone or tablet thanks to the GoSpetcro solution.

name: SOAN
businessDescription:
Soan is the first platform in Europe created to pay suppliers and get paid quickly! 

Our mission is to simplify secure business-to-business payments, so that our customers can reach their main objective: develop a stable and healthy business.
longBusinessDescription:
Soan is an intuitive platform that optimizes four major areas of business management:
- Simplification of invoicing : through an online collaborative space where entrepreneurs and their team can share and sign documents, create or import dematerialized invoices and settle automated payment reminders until your money is received.
- Reduction of payment delays : Invoices sent through Soan are paid in one click, and 91% of them are paid within 48h. A payment link is sent along with your invoice, which offers 4 payments methods other than the traditional bank transfer. (card payment, 3 installments without fees, debit and finally instant bank transfer).
- Supplier payments : On the same platform Soan offers the opportunity to pay your supplier easily with one click, no IBAN needed. Bills can be paid instantly or programmed for a better cashflow optimization.
- Cash flow control: For an optimal flow track and thanks to a powerful dashboard, Soan provides a precise invoicing follow-up (in progress, pending, paid etc...) and a real time overview on your accounts.
Soan also allows you to be ecologically committed. For every 3000€ processed on the platform, Soan plants a tree. A completely transparent and neutral action for the users, but 100% beneficial for the environment!

name: Spectral TMS
businessDescription: Startup specialized in the field of autonomous augmented reality for the industrial sector.Spectral offers an internal SaaS platform for augmented maintenance that helps and trains technicians during maintenance operations.

name: Feedier
businessDescription: Feedier helps companies collect amazing and actionable feedback by leveraging a built-in reward programs management and engagement program. We focus on helping companies collect better feedback by offering a great user experience, rewarding and engaging the end user.

Follow us on Instagram: @joko_fr Want to know more? https://medium.com/hellojoko To contact us: [email protected]

name: Kard
businessDescription:
At Kard, we believe young people deserve a banking experience that is adapted to their needs and gives them control. So we’re a team of passionate people busy building the best banking product in the world: one that is mobile, social, data-driven, authentic and free. 

By putting technology front and center, we want to offer a seamless experience to the millions of youth who will use our unique, fun and accessible product.

name: Ship&Co
businessDescription: Ship&Co is a software that gathering ground transport players such as Cabs, moto-cabs, group transport solutions, luggage transfer, electric vehicle... We connect our mobility software to tourism players as airports, airlines, OTAs, events agencies... to enhance their services offer to our final user their travellers and guests. With an unique connexion, those players have access to multiple ground transport solutions.
longBusinessDescription:
Ship&Co is developping a multimodal mobility software wich enable tourisme players such as airports, OTAs, airlines, train stations, hotels plateforms and events agencies to be connected to several ground transport player thanks to an unique access.
On a single software, we gathered multiple ground transport players such as Cabs, group transport solutions, luggage transfer, moto-cabs,bus,etc... We concluded partnerships with several compagnies such as Marcel VTC, Talixo, Blacklane, My Sam,etc.. And also with local compagnies located in various countries and cities. Until now our mobility solutions are spread in more than 400 cities mainly in Europe.
Concerning the final user, we tried to built an booking experience as simple as possible. With an unique access, they are able to plan their ride in advance, compare different ground transport solutions according to their needs ( green, the fastest, business or cheapest), to book and proceed to the checkout without being redirected on another website.
Finally, regarding our integration to our tourism partners, we provide a turnkey solution, either the partner wishes only an API connection or also wishes that Ship&Co make the front-end of the solution. In anycase, our connection is provided in white label.

name: ApiFlash
businessDescription: ApiFlash is a nice and easy to use API to capture screenshots at scale. It's built over Chrome and AWS Lambda to ensure pixel perfect screenshots. More than 4800 businesses use ApiFlash to make millions of screenshots per day.

name: iKAST.io
businessDescription: The mission of iKAST.io is to help Content Providers, through a blockchain-based ecosystem, to better distribute their videos and optimize the monetization by getting more qualified views on their contents and new distribution channels through a network of online video platforms.
longBusinessDescription:
iKAST.io aims to solve the most crucial Entertainment industry problems, such as lack of promotion and visibility for independent video contents, lack of distribution channels and consequently a lack of monetization and return on investment penalizing the creation as a whole. iKAST.io unites content providers, online video platforms and advertisers into a decentralized, open and virtuous ecosystem. The iKAST.io platform and its economy are powered by the KAST utility token. It is the only allowed medium used to fuel exchanges between all stakeholders of the ecosystem.
Developed by a team of media veterans (from Canal+, France Télévisions, NewsCorp, Ubisoft, Dailymotion, Huawei, Viacess, Irdeto), for the key players in the industry (TV channel, producers, pure web player), with top-class technology partners such as FlameFy, OKAST, Amazon Web Services, iKAST.io will disrupt the entertainment industry by offering the most secured and fairest rewarding ecosystem where every user’s engagement has a positive effect on the whole value chain.

name: Drinking-straw
businessDescription:
As a distributor, wholesaler, and supplier of drinking straws in all of Europe, the company offers a widest range of drinking straws at the best prices. 
Straws can be flexible, straight or curved, and color: black, white, green or even transparent. And there are various lengths and sizes to meet all your requests: straws for cocktails, straws for smoothies or even soda.

We offer attractive prices on our straws available from €0.01.

Our goal is to offer you products made from natural and renewable unprocessed materials (such as wheat, reed or bamboo). We also have single-use straws produced from waste. Finally, the reusable range makes it possible to move towards eco-friendly consumption and zero waste.
tags: drinking straw, free-plastic straws, compostable, biodegradable

name: SMT Performances
businessDescription: SMT Performances is the maker of a connected device for motorbike, called Pegase Moto. Its an anti theft GPS tracking combined with a smartphone app (Android and iOS).

name: Mindee
businessDescription: Build lightning-fast, accurate, and robust document processing automation features in your software.
longBusinessDescription:
Mindee is the first fully horizontal and developer-centric document understanding platform. We help developers and product teams worldwide build the most intuitive and efficient user experiences regarding document processing.
Using Mindee, you will be able to:
- Build magical UX using our 1-second-response-time synchronous API
- Differentiate your product leveraging the latest computer vision deep learning models
- Scale everywhere. We are fully language agnostic and do not depend on templates
- Save your users time and hassle by freeing them from manual data entry
- thanks to our client libraries in all main languages and our clean documentation
- Sleep tight knowing everything happens on a scalable and secure infrastructure, fully GDPR compliant
- Extend the fun by leveraging everything from our open-source software toolbox
- Trust the bill. No setup fee, no platform fee, no maintenance fee. Your only KPI is your volume? Ours too!
We are very proud to be powering among the fastest growing software products in many verticals ranging from Financial Services, Logistics or HealthCare to Construction, Insurance and Government.
The whole team, spread across all continents, is looking forward to hearing from you and your use case to help you as best as we can.

name: Mont Kiji
businessDescription:

We offer Custom Made Scarf (made-to-order design service), Personalized Scarf (personalizing design by adding initials or photos) and Limited Edition Scarf (thematic selection of designs). Our scarves are made by the highly skilled, century old craftsmanship in France.  

Mont Kiji ultimate goals is build a innovative platform for slow-fashion, including fine art filters, starting with custom scarves, for wearable art  that communicates better living: we aims to develop an automated process to let people designing their own truly personal and meaningful scarves that reflect their values and ideas.
tags: made in France, silk scarf, fashion accessory, custom made scarf, personalized scarf, limited edition scarf, luxury, meaningful gift, personalized gift

name: Okarito
businessDescription:
Okarito is a business travel solution that helps hundreds of companies and thousands of travelers flourish internationally. While guaranteeing them the best prices on the market.
On Okarito, the traveler can book his travel and has access to a personalised support during his trip. We also help the CFO to regain control on his travel expenses thanks to innovative tools. He can set up a dynamic travel budget that adapts in real time to market prices. Therefore he controls the travel options offered to travelers while giving them an increased flexibility. The employee is motivated to spend less than the given budget. A share of the savings he makes can be donated to a NGO of her choosing.

name: Koala
businessDescription: Koala provides insurance products to take care of your customers. At Koala, our procedures are 100% online to offer the ultimate customer experience. No proof or document are required to claim.

name: Hector Kitchen
businessDescription: Hector Kitchen is a tailored approach for feeding our dogs and cats. We innovate to give the best transparent quality and 100% accurate for their current nutritional needs. We also offer free monthly delivery, monthly evaluation of the digestibility to ensure that the dog or cat live better, live longer while we help pet owners to spend less on their overall budget. Hector Kitchen operates in France since February 2018 and will be soon available in Germany, Belgium, Spain and Italy. Hector Kitchen is 100% owned by Holidog Global, the #1 community of pet owners in Europe.

name: Unlatch
businessDescription:

Nearly 250 property developers, brokers, social landlords, including Quartus, Constructa, Emerige, and Demathieu Bard use the software.

name: Ubble.ai
businessDescription:
Ubble helps businesses fight against fraud with its frictionless online identity verification service that uses exclusive video live streaming and A.I. technology.
Ubble is the only Identity verification service based on video live streaming and artificial intelligence
The increase in online transactions and services has created major challenges for all types of businesses who need to verify their users’ identities on the spot:
verify the reliability of the user’s identity to fight against fraud offer an optimal user experience to avoid drops and increase conversion rates maintain a high level of data security and GDPR compliance

name: Powder
businessDescription:
Powder is the Instagram of gaming. Through specialized tools,we let gamers import their gameplay from PC, consoles (Xbox, PS4, Switch) or mobile.We let them edit it: trimming, visual + sound effects, overlays, zoom in/out, fast/slow motion, etc. And we let them share it, to our community or outside the app: Snap, TikTok, Instagram… Share clips. Make friends. Play with them. Repeat. 
Powder is a deep tech startup​. Our AI detects highlights from hours of gameplay, to help users trim and edit clips. ​It’s the engine behind our feed. Our team comprises four AI professionals, and we have several patents ranging from in-game highlights detection to emotions detection in the context of a mobile platform. 
Powder is booming​. In four months, we’ve created a 60k community on Discord and Instagram. 150+ people volunteer on the project. Our open beta lasted only 2 weeks – that’s the time it took to reach TestFlight’s 10k users limit. We’ve reached 1k five-stars ratings on the US Store in 10 days. And we’re just getting started.
Powder has raised €1.8m+ from leading Silicon Valley investors who have invested at early stages in Stripe, Airbnb or Snapchat. Members of our 15-people strong team have previously worked with Zenly, Lydia, Mindie, PandaScore, Artomatix, Nike and BCG, and have raised over €10m and sold multiple companies in the past.
longBusinessDescription:
Context
As our lives move from the physical to the virtual​, gamers need a platform to share their digital experiences to meet and connect with peers. There are 2.5bn gamers worldwide, playing an average of 1h/day. Both numbers experience double digit growth.
Mainstream “real life” social platforms get gaming equivalents​. Twitch is the YouTube of gaming. Discord is the Slack of gaming. But no one has built the Instagram of gaming: a platform focused on game clips, i.e. short videos of one’s gameplay.
Company presentation
Powder is the Instagram of gaming. Through specialized tools,we let gamers import their gameplay from PC, consoles (Xbox, PS4, Switch) or mobile.We let them edit it: trimming, visual + sound effects, overlays, zoom in/out, fast/slow motion, etc. And we let them share it, to our community or outside the app: Snap, TikTok, Instagram… Share clips. Make friends. Play with them. Repeat.
Powder is a deep tech startup​. Our AI detects highlights from hours of gameplay, to help users trim and edit clips. ​It’s the engine behind our feed. Our team comprises four AI professionals, and we have several patents ranging from in-game highlights detection to emotions detection in the context of a mobile platform.
Powder is booming​. In four months, we’ve created a 60k community on Discord and Instagram. 150+ people volunteer on the project. Our open beta lasted only 2 weeks – that’s the time it took to reach TestFlight’s 10k users limit. We’ve reached 1k five-stars ratings on the US Store in 10 days. And we’re just getting started.
Powder has raised €1.8m+ from leading Silicon Valley investors who have invested at early stages in Stripe, Airbnb or Snapchat. Members of our 15-people strong team have previously worked with Zenly, Lydia, Mindie, PandaScore, Artomatix, Nike and BCG, and have raised over €10m and sold multiple companies in the past.
tags: gaming; social network; AI; artificial intelligence; coding; tech; deep tech; iOS

name: Lisaqua
businessDescription:
Founded in  2018 by Charlotte Schoelinck, PhD in Marine Biology, Caroline Madoc, an engineer from Mines de Paris and Gabriel Boneu, an entrepreneur from HEC Paris, the company aims to o revolutionize aquaculture with its low environmental impact production system.

Lisaqua has developed “permaquaculture”, a patented co-culture technology combining shrimp, micro-organisms and marine invertebrates in recirculated indoor aquaculture farms. This innovation allows the farming of shrimp without antibiotics, preserves mangroves and saves 99% of water compared to conventional shrimp farming. Shrimp effluents are treated and used for breeding marine invertebrates for animal feed.

Since 2019, the company has been marketing a pioneering fresh, local and environmentally-friendly shrimp in France that is ‘triple-zero’ guaranteed – zero antibiotics, zero km travelled and zero polluting discharge. 

Each year, 80,000 tons of frozen shrimp are imported into France, and 290,000 tons into Europe. Lisaqua plans to produce 10,000 tons of shrimp per year by 2030 in France and Europe T​​his new round of funding will allow Lisaqua to finalize the construction of the first shrimp farm in France.

name: Boxy
businessDescription:
Redefining convenience shopping, the French startup was founded in 2019 with a new concept that responds to the constraint of everyday shopping using technology. Built using recycled sea containers, that can multiply indefinitely and fit into any environment, Boxy aims to be of use to the majority of French people who are facing an insufficient convenient offer and are not targeted by the services reserved for the biggest cities. 

The startup has a carefully selected offer of 250 useful products for everyday life (from groceries to take-out) at a fair price and tech is inwritten into the company’s DNA. Boxy provides a smooth, accessible and fast shopping experience – mastering the entire value chain (including data, logistics, goodwill and the network of outlets).

After downloading the Boxy application, entering your identity and registering your payment method, you can access the store (24 hours a day, 7 days a week) via QR code. Once inside, the 100% proprietary technology is based on hundreds of sensors and a system that combines computer vision and deep learning algorithms. This device automatically detects the selected items and invoices the customer as soon as he leaves the store, without having to go through a cash register. The receipt is sent in digital format a few minutes later.

name: Gouach
businessDescription:
Gouach is on a mission to enable sustainable and environmentally soft mobility. To do so, the startup has developed the first electric battery for bicycles, scooters, and small electric vehicles. The battery (entirely designed and developed in France, further increasing sustainability), is repairable in less than 10 minutes. 

The vision is that this battery will reduce the volume of electronic waste and lower the carbon footprint of micro-mobility batteries by 70%. 

Gouach founders, Alexandre Vallette, Maxime Agor and Maël Primet developed an innovative and patented battery design in 2020. They developed it based on a study which showed that hundreds of ‘dead’ batteries actually have a large proportion of components in perfect working order – they decided it would be better to develop a battery where defective components can be replaced easily and safely. 

In addition, the Gouach battery is connected – we live in a hyper-connected world after all. With a mobile app, users can track the battery’s life cycle in real-time, optimise its use, and receive alerts and diagnoses in the case of failure.

businessDescription:
Global warming is more relevant than ever with record heat on all continents. They face significant risks because majority of them do not have access to electricity and therefore lack access to refrigeration and other forms of cooling that can protect food and vaccines.

Koolboks provides Cooling as a Service (CaaS) or Pay-as-you-Go (PAYG)  with its ice powered battery-free off-grid solar refrigerators.
longBusinessDescription:
A group of eco-entrepreneurs created a unique and innovative product that solves three (3) very important needs of Africans; refrigeration, light and energy, by using a patentable technology which harnesses the power of the sun and water to generate continuous cooling in the absence of power or irregular power supply. That product is called Koolhome by Koolboks. - Koolhome is an affordable pay as you go off-grid solar battery-free refrigerator made specifically for households and businesses.
Koolboks provides Cooling as a Service (CaaS) or Pay-as-you-Go (PAYG) with its ice powered battery-free off-grid solar refrigerators.

name: AKUR8
businessDescription:
Akur8, the AI Pricing solution, enables insurance carriers to improve their profits and win market share with pricing models created and updated in hours instead of months. Akur8 developed unique leading edge algorithms dedicated to insurance pricing. The disruptive technology developed by our R&D team allows to combine Machine Learning and Actuarial worlds.
GLM (Generalized Linear Model) is a well-established technique that answers all Risk Modelling constraints: it is easy to understand and it enables a clear validation process. But it is manual. Iterations and discoveries are long and slow, involving large number actuarial resources.
Using cutting edge machine learning, we have automated GLM modelling. From variable selection to geographic smoothing, you decide the tradeoff between clarity and performance. You can immediately spot anomalies and discover new patterns. Building models with Akur8 is 10 times faster than with traditional solutions - with a better result.
Akur8 solution is built for actuaries. Delivered in SaaS, the solution can be implemented in a few weeks. With direct impact on loss ratio.

SCINTIL solutions combine the best of Silicon (Si) and Indium Phosphide (InP) materials using wafer-scale bonding of InP on Si and rely on commercial silicon foundry processes to build fully integrated photonic circuits (comprising multi-wavelength lasers, waveguides, wavelength filters, and photodetectors). Generating, Modulating, Routing, Filtering, and Detecting photons on a single chip, mass-produced in semiconductor commercial foundry Our capacity to integrate laser sources efficiently on silicon will fuel a wave of innovations in optical communications, 3D sensing, and Quantum photonics. Our technology combines the best of Silicon (Si) and Indium Phosphide (InP) photonics on a single chip using wafer-scale bonding for integrating lasers. It is compatible with the commercial silicon photonic foundries process to mass-produce fully integrated photonic circuits.
tags: silicon photonic, photons, chip, semiconductor, laser

name: Symfony
businessDescription:
Symfony at a Glance
A PHP framework
In order to better understand what a framework is, let’s leave the world of computer science for a moment and imagine a mountaineering adventure. Developing an application is very similar to climbing a rock wall: you are at the bottom (you have an application to be created) and you need to reach the summit (and be pleased with the achievement of designing an application that works perfectly.)

If no one has ever climbed the wall in question, you will have to get by on your own: testing routes, occasionally backtracking so that you don’t get stuck in a corner, driving in pitons, etc. In contrast, if the wall has already been conquered, those who have gone before you will already have done this trial and error work, opening up possible paths (the frame) and installing the tools that will facilitate the climb (your work).

Basically, a framework consists of:

A toolbox - a set of prefabricated, rapidly integrate software components. This means that you will have to write less code, with less risk of error. This also means greater productivity and the ability to devote more time to doing those things which provide greater added value, such as managing guiding principles, side effects, etc.
A methodology – an “assembly diagram” for applications. A structured approach may seem to constrain at first. But in reality, it allows developers to work both efficiently and effectively on the most complex aspects of a task, and the use of Best Practices guarantees the stability, maintainability, and upgradeability of the applications you develop.
And although it might be obvious, we thought it best to say it anyway – Symfony is a PHP framework, which means that it permits web applications to be built in PHP!

A philosophy
What could be more useful than an application developed by users for their own needs? This is the story of the genesis of Symfony – born from the imagination of the web designers at SensioLabs, a web developer in its own right. Symfony was made available to everyone under an Open Source license. This benefits other developers, who also have the ability to improve it by adding their own modules. All this was done in an environment of Best Practices, standardization and interoperability of applications.
tags: mountaineering adventure, climbing a rock wall, summit, methodology

businessDescription: TwicPics is a real-time image processing service which enables business of all sizes to deliver rich visual content with high performance and easy setup. It offers on-demand responsive image generation combined with a smart and unobtrusive javascript library, all based around a no-nonsense, testable, URL-based API. To get started right away, just turn your image elements src into a data-twic-src. This is but the very beginning though: TwicPics will give you access to a simple yet powerful API that can adapt to all kinds of responsive image situations. TwicPics acts as an image proxy. It requests your master image, stored on your own web server or in cloud storage like Amazon S3, then generates a device-adapted version of it, encoded using the best compression available, that's delivered directly to the end-user from the closest delivery point available.

Transparency, sympathy, and benevolence: the three qualities that we bring to the table. Like any superhero, Ulysse has incredible abilities. We offer you the **best flight options**, the capability of **booking a flight in 3 minutes** or less, and services you won’t be able to find anywhere else like automatic check-in or payments in three installments.

To get to where we are, we have fought from the beginning. We battled from the start to get rid of ads forever. No more pop-ups or cluttered boxes of advertisements that slow down your computer, our website is clean. There are other enemies of course like the changing prices from the start of a booking to the payment or getting in touch with customer service, but you do not have to worry because we have fought them all. longBusinessDescription: Vianova is building the operating system of the public realm, working with cities and mobility providers to better distribute and control access to public space. Our data platform enables seamless exchange of information between mobility providers and cities regarding traffic and curbside management. Cities can get access to mobility insights (based on telemetry data) directly from the connected vehicles for improved real-time transport orchestration and more informed urban planning. We also enable cities to push to mobility providers accurately and efficiently geo-fenced regulations. Mobility providers can access our Policy API to receive dynamically from local authorities regulatory and infrastructure information (speed limit, operating zones, curbside access, road closure, etc.). Our technological innovation is based on a bilateral data sharing protocol, a data infrastructure with proprietary algorithms and an HD map engine for enforcing spatial regulation as well as proprietary privacy preserving encryption techniques.
